analyzed: ācamana prabhṛti yena adhikaraṇena samyujyeta na tena vyāvarteta
tri prabhṛti ṣu ṛk gana iṣu prathama auttamayoḥ tris vacanam anyatra japebhyaḥ
uttamasya ca chandaḥ mānasya ūrdhvam ādi vyañjanāt sthāne omkāraḥ plutaḥ tri mātraḥ śuddhaḥ
avasāne makāra antam sarveṣu ṛk gaṇeṣu sa puronuvākyeṣu
tena ardharcam uttarasyāḥ saṃdhāya avasyati pādam vā tat saṃtatam iti ācakṣate
sa sarveṣām ṛk gaṇānām dharmaḥ ye karma samyogena codyante
vidūreṣu api karmasu antareṇa prathamām paridhānīyām ca saṃtāna arthaḥ ardharcena kāṅkṣati
praṇavaḥ ye yajā mahaḥ vaṣaṭkāraḥ sampraiṣāḥ praiṣāḥ ca auccais upāṃśu havihṣu
devatā nāmadheyam ca aupāṃśu nigama sthāneṣu
ye yajāmahe vauṣa lojaḥ sahaḥ sahaḥ ojaḥ svar iti upariṣṭāt iti catuṣṭayam sarvāsu yājyāsu
anuyājeṣu tu ye yajāmahaḥ ūnaḥ asti
bārhata rāthantaram vaṣaṭkuryāt purastāt dīrgham upariṣṭāt hrasvam
upariṣṭāt caye yajā mahāt devatā ādeśanam sa puronuvākhye
mantra pṛthak tvāt karma pṛthak tvam
yām pari astam ayam pūrṇā udiyāt yām ca astamita ite paurṇamāsyau
śvas na draṣṭā iti yat ahar cana dṛśyetate amāvāsye
iti paurṇamāsyām iti amāvāsyāyām iti upadeśāt vyavatiṣṭhante
āmantritaḥ hotā antareṇa autkaram praṇītāḥ ca pratipadya dakṣiṇena prapadena barhiḥ ākramaṇam

kam prapadye tam prapadye yat te prajāpateḥ śaraṇam chandaḥ tat prapadye yāvat te viṣṇo veda tāvat te kariṣyāmi devena savitā prasūtaḥ ārtvijyam kariṣyāmi namaḥ agnaye upadraṣṭe namaḥ vāyava upaśrotre namaḥ ādityāya anukyātre juṣṭām adya devebhyaḥ vācam vadiṣyāmi śuśrūṣeṇyām manuṣyebhyaḥ svadhāvatīm pitṛbhyaḥ pratiṣṭhām viśvasmai bhūtāya praśāsta ātmanā prajayā paśubhiḥ prajāpatim prapadye abhayam naḥ astu prājāpatyam
agnaāya ahi vītaye īḍenya eti tṛcau
tat anyat rasa ayanābhyām darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām
agne mahānasi brāhmaṇa bhārata iti praṇavena saṃdhāya
amutas arvāñci yajamānasya trīṇi ārṣeyāṇi abhivyāhṛtya
deva eddhaḥ manviddha ṛṣiṣṭutaḥ vipra anumaditaḥ kavi śastaḥ brahma saṃśitaḥ ghṛta āhavanaḥ iti avasāya
praṇīḥ yajñānām rathīḥ adhvarāṇām atūrtaḥ uhotā ātūrṇiḥ havyavāṭ iti avasāya
āspātram juhūḥ devānām camasaḥ deva pānaḥ arām iva agne nemiḥ devān tvam paribhūḥ asi iti avasāya
agnim agnaāvaha somam āvaha eti ājyabhāgau
agnim āvaha agnīṣomau āvaha viṣṇum vā agnīṣomau āvaha endra agnī āvaha aindram āvaha mahendram vā
upaviśya ūrdhva jānuḥ dakṣiṇena prādeśena bhūmim anvārabhya japati
asyai pratiṣṭhāyai mā achitsi pṛthivi mātar mām āhiṃsīḥ mā mā udoṣīḥ
madhu maniṣye madhu vaniṣye madhu janiṣye madhumatī madya devebhyaḥ vācam vadiṣyāmi cārum manuṣyebhyaḥ idam aham pañcadaśena vajreṇa pāpmānam bhrātṛvyam avabādheti
deva savita retam tvā vṛṇate saha pitrā vaiśvānareṇa aindra pūṣan bṛhaspate pracavada pracayaja vasūnām rātausyāma rudrāṇām omyābhyām
su ādityāḥ ādityāḥ anehasaḥ yadasya hotṛ vūrye
agniḥ tat punar ābharāt jātavedaḥ avicarṣaṇiḥ iti
upotthāya adhvaryoḥ dakṣiṇena prādeśena dakṣiṇam aṃsam anvārabhya japati savyena agnīdhaḥ dakṣiṇam
yena ayan uttamam svar devāḥ aṅgirasaḥ divam
yaṣṭiḥ ca adhvaryu navatiḥ ca pāśāḥ antarā dyāvāpṛthivī vicṛttāḥ
sinanti pākam adhi dhīra emi syoneme dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime iti
ṣaṭ mā urvī raṃhasaḥ pāntu dyauḥ ca pṛthivī ca ahar ca rātriḥ ca āpaḥ ca oṣadhayaḥ ca iti avasṛjya
aindrīm āvṛtam āvarte ādityasya āvṛtam anvāvarte iti dakṣiṇam bāhum anvāvṛtya
nirastaḥ parāvasuḥ yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ tena saha eti hotṛṣadanāt śuṣkam tṛṇam ubhayatas praticchidya dakṣiṇa aparam avāntaradeśam nirasya
idam aham arvāvasoḥ sadasi sīdāmi iti upaviśya
dakṣiṇa auttaram upastham kṛtvā a prāñcā upāṇī pragṛhya japati
namaḥ dyāvāpṛthivībhyām hotṛbhyām pūrvasūbhyām viśvakarmaṇau tanū pau me sthaḥ tanvam me pātam mām āhiṃsiṣṭam mām āsaṃtāptam iti āhavanīyam prekṣya gārhapatyam ca
udak saṃsarpan āha eṣā vām ākāśā eti
viśvedevāḥ śāstana tat adya vācaḥ namaḥ mahadbhyaḥ eti japitvā
agniḥ hotā vettu agniḥ hotram vettu prāvitram sādhu te yajamāna devatā iti avasāya
yaḥ agnim hotāram avṛthāḥ iti upāṃśu
ghṛtavatīm adhvaryoḥ srucam āsya sva devayuvam viśva vārām īḍām ahai devān īḍe anyān namasyām anamasyān yajāma yajñiyān iti sruva avādāpya pañca prayājān yajati
samidhaḥ samidhaḥ agne ājyasya vyantu iti prathamaḥ
narāśaṃsaḥ agna ājyasya vetu iti dvitīyaḥ vasiṣṭha śunakānām atri vadhryaśvānām kaṇva saṃkṛtīnām rājanyānām prajā kāmānām ca
iḍaḥ agne ājyasya vyantu iti tṛtīyaḥ
barhiḥ agne ājyasya vetu iti caturthaḥ
svāhā agnim svāhā somam svāhā agnim svāhā agnīṣomau viṣṇum vā svāhā agnīṣomau svāhā indra agnī svāhā indram mahendram vā svāhā devāḥ ājya pājuṣāṇāḥ agne ājyasya haviṣaḥ vyantu iti prayāja yājyāḥ
agniḥ vṛtrāṇi tvam soma asi sat patiḥ iti ājyabhāgau vārtraghnau paurṇamāsyām
agniḥ pratnena soma gīrbhiḥ iti amāvāsyāyām vṛdhanvantau
juṣāṇā agniḥ ājyasya haviṣaḥ vetu juṣāṇaḥ somaḥ ājyasya haviṣaḥ vetu iti yājye
juṣāṇau agnīṣomau ājyasya haviṣaḥ vītām iti yājyā
idma viṣṇuḥ vaṣaṭ te viṣṇo iti vaiṣṇvasya
agnīṣoma āsavedasā yuvam etāni iti agnīṣomīyasya
indra agnī avasā pracarṣaṇibhyaḥ eti aindrāgnasya
mahān indraḥ yaḥ ojasā mahān indraḥ nṛ vat iti māhendrasya
indram vaḥ viśvatas mādayasva haribhiḥ iti indrasya a pratinidheḥ

ayāṭ agniḥ agneḥ priyā dhāmāni ayāṭ somasya priyā dhāmāni ayāṭ agneḥ priyā dhāmāni ayāṭ agnīṣomayoḥ priyā dhāmāni viṣṇoḥ vā ayāṭ agnīṣomayoḥ priyā dhāmāni ayāṭ indra agnyoḥ priyā dhāmāni ayāṭ indrasya priyā dhāmāni mahendrasya vā ayāṭ devānām ājyapānām priyā dhāmāni yakṣat agneḥ hotuḥ priyā dhāmāni yakṣat svam mahimānam āyajatām
ejyā iṣaḥ kṛṇotu saḥ adhvarā jātavedā juṣatām haviḥ agne yat adya viśaḥ adhvarasya eti yājyā
iḍām upahvāsyamānasya dakṣiṇasya pāṇeḥ pradeśinyām anakti
vācaspatinā te hutasya prāśnāmi iṣe prāṇāya ed pūrvam añjanam adhara oṣṭhe nilipyati
prāśnāmi ūrje dānāya iti uttara oṣṭha auttaram
a prasāritābhiḥ aṅgulibhiḥ a muṣṭi kṛtābhiḥ
mukha sammitām dhārayan hṛdaya sammitām vā
upahūtam bṛhat saha divāsaha sūryeṇa saha cakṣuṣā a upamām bṛhat saha divāsaha sūryeṇa saha cakṣuṣā āhvayatām
upahūtam vāmadevyam saha antarikṣeṇa saha vāyunā saha prāṇena aupamām vāmadevyam saha antarikṣeṇa saha vāyunā saha prāṇena hvayatām
upahūtam rathantaram saha pṛthivyā asaha agninā asaha vācā asaha paśubhiḥ upamām rathantaram saha pṛthivyā asaha agninā asaha vācā asaha paśubhiḥ hvayatām
upahūtam sthāsnu bhuvanam upamām sthāsnu bhuvanam hvayatām
upahūtam cariṣṇu bhuvanam upamām cariṣṇu bhuvanam hvayatām
upahūtaḥ sakhā bhakṣa aupamām sakhā bhakṣaḥ hvayatām
upahūtāḥ saptahotrā a upamām saptahotrā āhvayatām
upahūtā agāvaḥ saha āśirā aupamam agāvaḥ saha āśirā āhvayantām
upahūtā avāk saha prāṇena aupamā mvāk saha prāṇena hvayatām
upahūtā avāk saha manasā aupamā mvāk saha manasā āhvayatām
upahūtā ahesā asi juṣa svamā iḷā eti japitvā aiḷām upahvayate
iḍā upahūtā upahūtā iḍā upa asmān iḍā hvayatām iḍā upahūtā mānavī ghṛtapadī maitrāvaruṇī
daivyā adhvaryavā aupahūtā upahūtā manuṣyāyai mam yajñamava anye
upahūtā idyāvāpṛthivī pūrvaje ṛtāvarī devī devaputre
upahūtaḥ ayam yajamānaḥ uttarasyām deva yajyāyām upahūtaḥ bhūyasi haviṣkaraṇa edam me devā haviḥ juṣantām iti tasmin upahūtaḥ eti upahūya
iḍā asi syonā asi syona kṛt sānaḥ suprajāstvā i rājaspoṣa idhāḥ
juṣṭe juṣṭimte gameya upahūta upahavamte aśīya mukhasya tvā dyumnāya surabhya asya tvāya prāśnāmi iti uttaraiḥ ḍām prāśya
idam āpaiti tṛcena antarvedi pavitravati mārjayante
eṣā te agne samidh tayā vardhasva ca ācapyāyasva
devam barhiḥ vasu vane vasudhā iyasi avetu
devaḥ narāśaṃsaḥ vasu vane vasudheyasi avetu
devaḥ agniḥ sviṣṭakṛt su draviṇā mandraḥ kaviḥ satya manmā āyajīhotā hotuḥ hotuḥ āyajīyān agneyān devān ayāḍyān apipreryeta hotre amatsata iti avasāya
tām sasanuṣīm hotrām devam gamām divideva iṣu yajñam eraya emam sviṣṭakṛt ca agne hotā abhūḥ vasu vane vasudheyasya namovāke vīhi iti anuyāja yājyāḥ
idam dyāvāpṛthivī bhadram abhūt ārdhmasūktavākam uta namovākam ṛdhyāsmasūktaucyam
agne tvam sūkta vāc asi iti avasāya
upaśrutī divaspṛthivyoḥ romanvatī ite asmin yajñe yajamāna dyāvāpṛthivīḥ tām iti avasāya
śaṃgayī jīradānū atrasnū apravede urugavyūtī abhayamkṛtau iti avasāya
vṛṣṭi dyāvārī iti āpa aśambhuvā mayobhuvā ūrjasvatī payasvatī su upacaraṇāca svadhicaraṇāca tayoḥ rāvidī iti avasāya
agniḥ haviḥ ajuṣata avīvṛdhata mahaḥ jyāyaḥ akṛta
somaḥ haviḥ ajuṣata avīvṛdhata mahaḥ jyāyaḥ akṛta
agniḥ haviḥ ajuṣaṭa avīvṛdhata mahaḥ jyāyaḥ akṛta
agnīṣomau haviḥ ajuṣetām avīvṛdhetām mahaḥ jyāyaḥ akrātām
agnīṣomau haviḥ ajuṣetām avīvṛdhetām mahaḥ jyāyaḥ akrātām
indra agnī haviḥ ajuṣetām avīvṛdhetām mahaḥ jyāyaḥ akrātām
indraḥ haviḥ ajuṣata avīvṛdhata mahaḥ jyāyaḥ akṛta
devāḥ ājya pāḥ ājyam ajuṣanta avīvṛdhanta mahaḥ jyāyaḥ akrata
agniḥ hotreṇa haviḥ ajuṣata avīvṛdhata mahaḥ jyāyaḥ akṛta
asyām ṛdhat hotrāyām devamgamāyām āśāste ayam yajamānaḥ
asau asau iti nāmanī yajamānasya abhivyāhṛtya auttarām deva yajyām āśāste bhūyaḥ haviṣkaraṇam āśāste āyuḥ āśāste suprajāstvam āśāste divyam dhāma āśāste
yat anena haviṣā āśāste tat aśyāt tat ṛdhyāt tat asmai devāḥ rāsantām tat agniḥ devaḥ devebhyaḥ vanutām vayam agneḥ parimānuṣāḥ
iṣṭamca vītamca abhūt ubhe ca enam na eti vā
dyāvāpṛthivī aṃhasaḥ pātāmau iha gatiḥ vāmasya edam canamaḥ devebhyaḥ iti
namaḥ upaiti barhiṣi añjalim nidhāya japati
śamyoḥ brūhi iti uktaḥ tat śamyoḥ iti śamyorvākam uktvā upaspṛśya
sruc ādāpana ādi mandrayā ājyabhāga antam
somam tvaṣṭāram devānām patnīḥ agnim gṛhapatim iti yajati
rākā sinīvālyau prajā kāmasya pūrve gṛhapateḥ
āpyāyasva sam te payāṃsi iha tvaṣṭāram tat naḥ turīpam devānām patnīḥ uta agnāvyanturākāmahamyā sterākesinīvāliyā subāhuḥ agniḥ hotā gṛhapatiḥ vayam u tvā gṛhapate iti
upahūtā aiyamī ajamānī iti vā vikāraḥ
pra tvā muñcāmi iti vedam vimucya yoktram
kāmāya tvā vedaḥ asi yena tvam veda devebhyaḥ vedaḥ abhavaḥ tena asmabhyam veda edhi
vedaḥ asi vittiḥ asi videyam karma asi karaṇam asi kriyā sam saniḥ asi sani tā asi saneyam
sa tṛṇāni pragṛhya antareṇa ūrūn yasyate
tantum tanvan iti uttareṇa gārhapatyam ābarhiṣaḥ stīrtvā
āpṛṇaḥ asi sampṛṇaḥ prajayā amā paśubhiḥ āpṛṇa iti veda śeṣam upasthāya
etena agne brahmaṇā ayāṭ yajñam jātavedāḥ antaraḥ pūrvaḥ asmin niṣadya
sanvan sanim su vimucā avimuñca dhehi asmabhyam draviṇam jātavedaḥ
vyākhyātau darśa pūrṇamāsau prakṛtiḥ iṣṭi paśubandhānām
antareṇa ājyabhāgau sviṣṭakṛtam ca yat ijyate tam āvāpa iti ācakṣate etat pradhānam
pradānam ucca avacābhiḥ devatābhiḥ samyujya śrūyate
tatra devatā vikāra tad devatā yājyā puronuvākye
nigama sthāneṣu ca sā devatā upalakṣyate
āvāhana auttame prayāje sviṣṭakṛt nigade sūktavāke ca ejyamānāḥ devatāni gacchanti tasmāt nigama sthānāni
paurṇamāsī vikāraḥ eti uktā vārtraghnau pratīyāt
codanā prakaraṇa ihaviṣām pratīka grahaṇam yājyā puronuvākyā nāmnā ced anyaḥ artha samyogaḥ
upasṛṣṭāsu devatāsu an adhigacchan tad liṅge daivatena tuṣyet
abhīkṣṇam ca eka ekasyai devatāyai haviḥ codyate tad traye prathamā upadiṣṭā yājyā puronuvākyā ite sarvatra pratīyāt
na ca eṣṭayaḥ pṛthaktvataḥ śakyāḥ parisaṃkhyātum
tatra an ādiṣṭa yājyā puronuvākyāsu gāyatrī triṣṭubhau tad devate parīcchet
huve havā mahe śrudhyā gahyā idam barhiḥ niṣīda devatā nāma eti puronuvākyā lakṣaṇāni
addhi piba juṣasva matsva āvṛṣāyasva vīhi pradevatā nāma eti yājyā lakṣaṇāni
an adhigacchan tad devatena rābhyām yajet
imam āśṛṇudhi havam yat tvā gīrbhiḥ havāmahe
a heḷa nā manasā aidam juṣasva vīhi havyam prayatam āhutam naḥ
iti ūhet dvi devata bahu devateṣu
prākṛtīḥ vā abhisamnamet prākṛtīḥ vā abhisamnamet
kṛttikā prabhṛtīni trīṇi phalgunī prabhṛtīni ca
sadyas dvādaśa aha māsa ṛtau saṃvatsarā iva
tam hi śaśvantaḥ īḍate te sya amaye agnaye eti sviṣṭakṛtaḥ
agnaye ca pāvakāya agnaye ca śucaye dvitīyā
agnim agnim havīmabhiḥ agninā aṅgiḥ samidhyate eti sviṣṭakṛtaḥ
tvam agne saprathāḥ soma yāḥ taitisadvantau ājyabhāgau
mahīm ūṣu mātaram suvratānām ṛtasya patnīm avasehuvema
tuvi kṣatrām ajarantīm urūcīm su śarmāṇam aditim su praṇītim
praiddhaḥ agnaimaḥ agna iti virājau sviṣṭakṛtaḥ
arcantaḥ tvā agnim stomena eti sviṣṭakṛtaḥ
ājyena tanū devatāḥ purastāt puroḍāśasya agnim pavamānam pāvakam ca śucim ca upariṣṭāt
viśvebhiḥ agne agnibhiḥ agne viśvebhiḥ agnibhiḥ iti sviṣṭakṛtaḥ
tākṣṇīnām tanū devatābhiḥ eka haviṣaḥ tri aham vaiṣṇava dvitīyābhiḥ aparam āditya tṛtīyābhiḥ aparam daśamī avikṛtā āgneyī
śata māna ratha vāsaḥ ajāḥ ca
āhita agniḥ vratena an iṣṭvā paśunā māṃsam aśnīyāt na an iṣṭvā āgrayaṇena navānām oṣadhīnām phalāni
agnāviṣṇū mahita dvām mahi tvampātam ghṛtasya guhya ani nāma
dame dame suṣṭutiḥ vāmiyāna upa vām jihvā ghṛtam ācaraṇyat
agnā viṣṇū mahi dhāma priyam vām vīthaḥ ghṛtasya guhyā juṣāṇā
dame dame sapta ratna ādadhānā prativām jihvā ghṛtam uccaraṇyat
pañca haviṣam eke agnaye bhagine vratapataye ca
tvam agne vīravat yaśaḥ tvam bhaga ūnaḥ
vaiśvānaraḥ na ūtaye ā prayātu parāvataḥ
triṣu ca prayājeṣu agni śabdaḥ vikṛtaḥ
tanūnapāt agni miḍaḥ agninā barhiḥ agniḥ
agnim stomena bodhaya eti vā agnaye buddhimate
agne āyūṃṣi iti uttaraḥ agnaye pavamānāya
agne tam adya eti prathamā tṛtīye haviṣaḥ dvitīyā caturthyau sviṣṭakṛtaḥ
devam barhiḥ agneḥ vasu vane devaḥ narāśaṃsaḥ agnāvasu vane
agni śabdam caturṣu pūrveṣu prayājeṣu anuyājayoḥ ca vibhaktayā eti ācakṣate
punar utsyūtaḥ jarat saṃvyāyaḥ punar saṃskṛtaḥ kadrathaḥ anaḍvān hiraṇyam vā dakṣiṇā
satvamnaḥ agne avamaḥ tvamnaḥ agne varuṇasya vidvān iti
agnihotram juhoti sāyam ca prātar ca
purā chāyānām saṃsargāt gārhapatyāt āhavanīyam uddharati
gata śriyaḥ śuśruvān brāhmaṇaḥ grāmaṇīḥ ājanyaḥ
uddhriyamāṇa auddhara pāpmanaḥ māyat avidvān yat ca vidvān cakāra
ahnā yat enaḥ cakṛma eha kiṃcid sarvasmāt mā uddhṛtaḥ pāhi tasmāt
amṛta āhutim amṛtāyām juhomi agnim pṛthivyām amṛtasya jityai
tayā anantam lokam aham jayāni prajāpatiḥ yam prathamaḥ jigāya eti
ṛtam tvā satyena pariṣiñcāmi iti tris tris eka ekam paryukṣya hutvā ca
satyam tvā aṛtena pariṣiñcāmi iti prātar
yajñasya saṃtatiḥ asi yajñasya tvā saṃtatyai nayāni iti gārhapatyāt saṃtatām uda dhārām āhavanīyāt
tantum tanvan iti antarā aśva āpade gate
unnīya abhyuditam ātamanāt āsitvā a hutvā varam dattvā abhūḥ iti anumantrayeta
a hutvā a vā āuduhya āhavanīyam anyampraṇīya juhuyāt
payaḥ yavāgūḥ dadhi ājyam agnihotra havīṃṣi
paścāt anvāhāryapacanāt yajamānaḥ prati an tiṣṭhan ādityam upatiṣṭhate satya ṛtāya tvā dakṣiṇā āmnayāni iti sāyam
ṛta satyāya tvā dakṣiṇā āmnayāni iti āhavanīyam prātar
vṛṣṭiḥ asi pāpmānam me vṛśca vidyā asi vidya me pāpmānam iti ācāmati
agnaye devebhyaḥ dhukṣva eti sāyam japati
aśanāyā pipāseḥ triyāvaiḥ triyambādhanteḥ tiryāva ambādhe agniyotryāvatsena vīreṇa eti sāyam prātar
subhūta kṛtaḥ subhūta mnaḥ kṛṇuta iti upaveṣeṇa audīcaḥ aṅgārān gārhapatyāt niruhya adhiśrayati aśanāyāpipāsīyena agnihotra sthālyā gārhapatyena vīreṇa eti vikāraḥ
agneḥ tvā a cakṣuṣā avekṣa eti samidham ādīpya avajyotya
sam āpaḥ oṣadhīnām rasena eti sruveṇa apaḥ pratyānīya
namaḥ devebhyaḥ eti dakṣiṇatas aṅgārān upaspṛśya
sruvam ca srucam ca pratitapya unnayati aśanāyāpipāsīyena srucā a sruveṇa vīreṇa eti vikāraḥ
sajūs devebhyaḥ sāyamyau abhyaiti sāyam japati
sajūs devebhyaḥ prātar yau abhyaiti prātar

uttareṇa gārhapatyam srucam upasādya prādeśa mātrīm pālāśīm samidham ādāya srucam ca samayā atihṛtya gārhapatyam āhavanīyasya paścāt udak agreṣu kuśeṣu srucam upasādya samidham abhyādadhāti aśanāyāpipāsīyena samidhaḥ āhavanīyena vīreṇa eti vikāraḥ
agniḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ agniḥ svāhā iti sāyam
sūryaḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāhā iti prātar
upasādya auttarām a saṃsṛjan tūṣṇīm bhūyasīm pūrvasyāḥ
śrucaḥ budhnena aṅgārān upaspṛśya dvis udīcīm srucam udyamya upasādayati
agan prāṇaḥ svargam lokam jite jayāmi abhayam me a loka tāyāḥ a putra tāyāḥ a paśu tāyāḥ iti yajamānaḥ pūrvām āhutim anuprāṇiti
āganna pāna ātmānam vijite vijayāmi abhayam me a loka tāyāḥ a putra tāyāḥ a paśu tāyāḥ iti uttarām anvavāniti
yā yajñasya samṛddhasya āśīḥ sāme samṛdhyatām iti
hutayoḥ uttaratas pratīcīm sāyam dvis upamārṣṭi
pūrvam upamārjanam kuśeṣu nilimpati oṣadhīḥ prīṇāmi iti manasā
uttaram dakṣiṇatas pāṇim uttānam nidadhāti pitṝn prīṇāmi iti manasā
dvis pradeśinyā a prāśya aupabdimat udan paryāvṛtya
prāc daṇḍayā a bhakṣayitvā prāc daṇḍām paryasya nirlihya prakṣālya ācamya prāc udīcīḥ apautsicya prāc udīcīm uddiśati
sarveṣu tu juhvati ūrṇām srucam uttareṇa gārhapatyam nidhāya
iha puṣṭim puṣṭi patiḥ dadhātu iha prajām janayatu prajāpatiḥ
agnaye rayimate paśumate puṣṭi pataye svāhā
tat savituḥ vareṇyam bhūḥ vāc bahu bahu me bhūyāt svāhā
bhargaḥ devasya dhīmahi bhuvaḥ prāṇaḥ bhūyān bhūyas me bhūyāt svāhā
dhiyaḥ yonaḥ pracodayāt svar nāma sarvam sarvam me bhūyāt svāhā
agnaye anna ādāya annapataye svāhā iti anvāhāryapacane caturthī
yāḥ sruci apaḥ traidham tāḥ karoti agnihotra sthālyām gārhapatyasya paścāt añjalau ca patnyāḥ
sam tvā sṛjāmi prajayā adhanena eti añjalau
upa prayantaḥ adhvaram ayam agniḥ sahasriṇau bhāvām ayam te yoniḥ ayam iha asya pratnām iti ṣaṇṇām tris prathamām uttamām ca
āyuḥ dāḥ agne asya āyuḥ mede hi varcaḥ dāḥ agne asi varcaḥ mede hi tanūpāḥ agne asi tanvam me pāhi agne yat me ūnam tanvaḥ tat me āpṛṇa
indhānāḥ tvā aśatam himā dyumantam samidhīmahi
agne sapatna dambhanam adabdha asaḥ adābhyam
citra avaso svasti te pāram aśīya iti tris
sam tvam agne sūryasya varcasā āgathāḥ sam ṛṣīṇām stutena sam ṛṣīṇām stutena sampriyeṇa dhāmnā sam aham āyuṣā samvarcasā samprajayā sampriyeṇa dhāmnā sam rāyaspoṣeṇa ṣīya
ambhastha ambhovobhakṣīya mahastha mahovobhakṣīya ūrjastha ūrjamvobhakṣīya rāyaspoṣastha rāyaspoṣamvobhakṣīya
revatīḥ ramadhvam asmin yonau asmin loke asmin goṣṭhe asmin kṣaye asyām āśiṣi asyām pratiṣṭhāyām iha eva stha etomā apagāta eti gām abhyeti
saṃhitā asi viśvarūpī ūjā mā ā viśa gaupatyena eti asya ā lalāṭam upaspṛśya
upa tvā agne iti tṛcena agne tvā naḥ iti ca dvaipadena gārhapatyam
iḷehi adite ehi sūnṛtehi iti gām abhyeti
somānam svaraṇam iti tṛcena auttaratas anvāhāryapacanam
antareṇa gārhapatya āhavanīya aumāhitram japitvā āhavanīyam upatiṣṭhate
sarveṣu tu juhvan mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ tisraḥ tisraḥ samidhaḥ abhyādadhāti āhavanīye vai ekahāvī aikahāvī
daivaḥ tantuḥ asi anu tvā ārabhema aham tvad vyavacchitsi iti āhavanīyasya dakṣiṇatas aṅgārān upaspṛśya

tatas asi tantuḥ asi anumā saṃtanuhi prajayā paśubhiḥ rāyaspoṣeṇa suprajāstvena suvīryeṇa mānuṣaḥ tantuḥ asi anumā ārabhasva mā tvam mat vyavacchitthāḥ asau iti jyeṣṭhasya putrasya nāma abhivyāhṛtya yāvantaḥ vā bhavanti
satyena avabhṛtham abhyavaimi apsuvratam iti ācamya vācam visṛjate
bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar su prajāḥ prajābhiḥ bhūyāsam su poṣaḥ poṣaiḥ su vīraḥ vīraiḥ abhayam te abhayam naḥ astu manasā tvā upatiṣṭhe lokam upaimi svar ca iti āhavanīyam
abhayam te abhayam naḥ astu vācā tvā upatiṣṭhe prajām upaimi paśūn ca iti gārhapatyam
abhayam te abhayam naḥ astu prāṇena tvā upatiṣṭhe vyānam upaimi āyuḥ ca iti anvāhāryapacanam
abhayam vaḥ abhayam naḥ astu kāmena vā upatiṣṭhate vittim upaimi bhūtim ca eti sarvān
samānam samidh prabhṛti ā vratasya visarjanāt
pravatsyan agnīn samīkṣate abhayam vaḥ abhayam naḥ astu iti
narya prajām me pāhi mānuṣān mā abhayāt pāhi iti gārhapatyam
atharya pitum me pāhi pitryāt mā abhayāt pāhi iti anvāhāryapacanam
tam uttareṇa gatvā āśaṃsya paśūn me pāhi daivāt mā bhayāt pāhi iti āhavanīyam
annam annam iti trīṇi padāni abhyuddhṛtya a sakāśāt vāgyamanam
saṃdhi velayoḥ vā ācamya vā ācamya tvā punar ācamya mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ visargaḥ
cakṣuḥ viṣaye agnīnām vā ācamya acchet proṣya āyan
āganma vṛtra hantamam asmabhyam vasu vittamam
śaṃsya paśūn me ajugupaḥ tān me pāhi eva daivān mā abhayāt ajugupaḥ tasmāt mā apāhi eva eti āhavanīyam
tṛṇa apacayanam samidh ādhānam ca sarveṣu
ayam agniḥ purīṣyaḥ ūrayimān puṣṭi vardhanaḥ
atharya pitum me ajugupsaḥ tam me pāhi eva pitryāt mā bhayāt ajugupaḥ tasmāt mā apāhi eva eti anvāhāryapacanam
ayam agniḥ gṛhapatiḥ gārhapatyāt prajāyā vasu vittamaḥ
narya prajām me ajugupaḥ tām me pāhi eva mānuṣāt mā abhayāt ajugupaḥ tat mānmā apāhi eva eti gārhapatyam
vāstoṣpatīyam dhrauvye daśa rātra avara ardhe samprayāteṣu
agniṣṭhasya dakṣiṇe yuktā a upohya cīvaram vāstoṣpate pratijānīhi iti anūcya vāstoṣpate śagmayā iti yajati
samārohayamāṇaḥ gārhapatye pāṇī pratitapya prāṇān sammṛśati ehi me prāṇān āroha eti
sakṛt sakṛt mantreṇa dvis dvis tūṣṇīm
ayam te yoniḥ iti vāraṇī pratitapati
sakṛt sakṛt mantreṇa dvis dvis tūṣṇīm
upāvaroha jātavedaḥ punar tvam devebhyaḥ havyam vahanaḥ prajānan
āyuḥ prajā mrayi masma asu dhehi ariṣṭa udīdihi no duroṇe
juṣṭaḥ damūnāḥ agne śardhā eti sviṣṭakṛtaḥ
anāgate parvaṇi amāvāsye pravṛtte abhyudita eṣṭiḥ
agnaye dātra aindrāya pradātre viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya eti
atīte parvaṇi amāvāsye pravṛtte abhyuddṛṣṭa eṣṭi
agnaye pathikṛte aindrāya vṛtra ghne vaiśvānarāya
pathikṛte antareṇa vihāram cakrī vati vṛtte niyata atipattau ca
vratapataye vratya velām proṣya avratyam vā ācaritvā
agnaāya ahi vītaye yaḥ agnim deva vītaye
kayānaḥ agne vivasaḥ tvām agne mānuṣīḥ
agniḥ pareṣu dhāma su kāmaḥ bhūtasya bhavyasya
tvam agne vrata bhṛt śuciḥ agne devān iha āvaha
vratāni bibhrat vratapāḥ adābhyaḥ bhavānaḥ udūtaḥ ajaraḥ suvīraḥ
dadhar ratnāni su mṛlīkaḥ agne gopāyanaḥ jīvase jātavedaḥ
marutaḥ tveṣa sadṛśa āyāta yamau iva
vāta tviṣaḥ marutaḥ śriyā ikam iti vā
jñātayaḥ a saṃvidānāḥ bahu devatām iṣṭim nirvaperan
agniḥ prathamaḥ vasubhiḥ naḥ avyāt somaḥ rudraiḥ abhirakṣatu tmanā
indra ūm rudbhiḥ ṛtuthā kṛṣaḥ uta ādityaiḥ naḥ varuṇaḥ śarma yaṃsat
sam agniḥ vasubhiḥ naḥ avyāt sam somaḥ rudriyābhiḥ tanūbhiḥ
sam indraḥ rāta havyaḥ marudbhiḥ sam ādityaiḥ varuṇaḥ viśva vedāḥ
agninā arayim gaya sphānā iti ājyabhāgau
agniḥ somaḥ varuṇaḥ mitra aindraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ savitā ayaḥ sahasrī
pūṣā naḥ gobhiḥ avasā sarasvatī tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi sama naktu yajñaiḥ
tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi dadhatī sarasvatī pūṣā bhagam savitā me dadātu
bṛhaspatiḥ dadat indraḥ balam me mitraḥ kṣatram varuṇaḥ somaḥ agniḥ
phālgunyām paurṇamāsyām prayoge a dīkṣita ayanānām
abhyañjana hata avika palpūlita aninavaḥ te
somam rājānam candramasam bhakṣayāmi iti manasā adhyāyan aśnāti
purā śamyorvākāt ūrdhvam vā anāvāhyavājinaḥ yajati
uttame prayāje nigacchanti yathāartham ca sūktavāke
vājinaḥ devāḥ haviḥ joṣayiṣyante vardhayiṣyante mahaḥ jyāyaḥ kariṣyante
śamnaḥ bhavantu vājinaḥ vājā iva ajā iti ūrdhvajñuḥ an avānam yajati
yajamānaḥ brahmā hotā adhvaryuḥ āgnīdhraḥ ca samupahūya bhakṣayanti
yat me retaḥ pradhāvati yat vā asiktam prajāyate
rājñā somena tat vayam asmāsu dhārayāmasi
vājaḥ asi vājinam asi vājaḥ mayi dhehi iti bhakṣa mantraḥ
agnīṣomīyaḥ saupāṃśuyājaḥ sāmnāyyam ca aindram paurṇamāsyām
arcantaḥ tu asmākam agne adhvaram iti uttarasya āgneyasya
na śaunakayajñe sākamprasthāyye ca vikāraḥ hotum asti
aindrāgna āgnendra uvā vaiśvadeva udyāvāpṛthivīya śca vrīhi yavānām
agnihotrīm vā an avānādayitvā tasyai dugdhena sāyam prātar agnihotram juhuyāt
gārhapatye iva ā sthālīpākam śrapayitvā āgrayaṇa devatābhyaḥ sviṣṭakṛt caturthībhyaḥ svāhākāreṇa āhavanīye juhuyāt
agni manthanīyāḥ ca āsannaṣu āsanneṣu havihṣu
tvām agne puṣkara aditi ca tisraḥ
uta bruvantu janta vā eti jātāya
āyam hastena khādinam iti hastena dhāryamāṇāya
devīḥ dvāraḥ vasu vane vasudhā iyasi avyantu
devī uṣāsā naktāvasu vane vasudhā yasya avītām
devī joṣṭrī vasu vane vasudhā iyasi avītām
devī ūrjaḥ āhutī vasuvane vasudhā yasya avītām
devī uṣāsā naktāvasu vane vasudhā yasya avītām
devī joṣṭrī vasu vane vasudhā iyasi avītām
devīḥ tisraḥ tisraḥ devīḥ vasuvane vasudheyasi avyantu
māṃsa anaśanam brahmacaryam pra anadhas śeta ṛtu kāle vā ajāyām upeyāt satya vadanam ca antarāla vratāni
imam me varuṇa tat tvā ayāmi
pra devam devyāḥ iti tisṛṇām āsīnaḥ prathamām
agne viśvebhiḥ su anīka sīda hotar nihotā tvam dūtaḥ
yatra ca āsīnaḥ prathamām anvavocat tat sthitvā utsṛjyate
vāruṇyā a niṣkāṣeṇa avabhṛtham avaiti yathā some
agnaye anīkavate pūrvasyām paurṇamāsyām iṣṭiḥ pūrva ahṇe
anīkaiḥ dveṣaḥ ardaya agne viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ
agninā arayim gaya sphānā iti ājyabhāgau
tasya niṣkāṣam prātar pūrṇa darvyam hutvā iṣṭim marudbhyaḥ krīḍibhyaḥ
apara ahṇe pitrya atri haviḥ iṣṭiḥ
somāya pitṛmate pitṛbhyaḥ vā somavadbhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ barhiṣadbhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ agniṣvāttebhyaḥ
tvam soma pracikitaḥ somaḥ dhenum tvam soma pitṛbhiḥ iti somasya pitṛmataḥ
udīratām aṅgirasaḥ yenaḥ pūrva eti somavatām
avasṛjayet ca eha agniṣvāttāḥ iti agniṣvāttānām
eka ekā yājyā dve dve pūrve puronuvākye
yeta atṛṣuḥ tvam agne īḍitaḥ iti agneḥ kavyavāhanasya
sampraiṣeṣu svadhā śabde kriyamāṇe ye svdhā mahe svadhā namaḥ iti ye yajāmaha vaṣaṭkārayoḥ sthāne
uśantaḥ tvā iti ekām sāmidhenīm tris anūcya na ārṣeyam āha
apabarhiṣaḥ prayājān iṣṭvā naḥ agne sucetunā tvam somam mahebhagam iti jīvanavantau ājyabhāgau
ayā aviṣṭhā janayan karvarāṇi sahi ghṛṇiḥ uuruḥ varāya gātuḥ
sapati udait haruṇam madhvaḥ agram svāmyat tanūm tanvā amairayata
su saṃdṛśam tvā avayam akṣan amīmadanta aupaūṣuśṛṇuhi iti āhavanīyam upasthāya
manaḥ nvā huvāmahe iti tṛcena dakṣiṇa agnim
āma etu manaḥ punar iti brūyuḥ
agnim tam manyai iti tṛcena agne tvam nai iti ca dvaipadena gārhapatyam
taraṇiḥ viśva darśataḥ divaḥ rukmaḥ eti
bhuvanam āviveśa yayoḥ ānandaḥ nihotaḥ mahaḥ ca
śunāsīrau ṛtubhiḥ saṃvidānā indravantā haviḥ idam juṣethām
pra havyāni ghṛtavanti asmai haryaśvāya bharatāsa joṣāḥ
indra ṛbhubhiḥ brahmaṇā a saṃvidānaḥ śunāsīrī haviḥ idam juṣasva
pañca varṣeṣu pūrvedyus śunāsīryam aparedyus vaiśvadevam
āyāḥ ca agne asi an abhiśastiḥ ca satyam id tvam ayās asi
ayāsām anasākṛtaḥ ayās san havyam ūhiṣe
anantaram doṣāt prāyaścittam na hi anirhate doṣe pravṛttiḥ uttarasya asti
pratyakṣa vihitam ca ekeṣu doṣeṣu prāyaścittam tatra ubhe kuryāt sarvaprāyaścittam ca ādhikārikam ca
an uddhṛtam ced āhavanīyam abhyastam iyāt bahu vidā abrāhmaṇena auddharaṇam
jātarūpam ca kuśe prabadhya agratas haranti
āhavanīye anugate gārhapatyāt uddharaṇam agnaye ca eṣṭiḥ jyotiṣmate
gārhapatye anugate pūrvam adhyavasāya āhavanīyam anyam praṇīya juhuyāt
ubhayoḥ anugatayoḥ gārhapatya aulmukāt uttara araṇyā manthanam
ulmuke a vidyamāne araṇī bhasmanā saṃspṛśya agnaye ca tapasvate janadvate pāvakavatā iṣṭiḥ
āyāhi tapasā janeṣu ā agne pāvakaḥ arciṣā
ānoya ahi tapasā janeṣu ā agne pāvaka dīdyat
iti abhyuditayoḥ tu abhyastam itayoḥ vā anyena vā anaṣṭayoḥ kāraṇena agnyādheyena utpādayet
upasṛṣṭā ced agnihotrī vā aśyetasūyavasa āditi yavasa muṣṭim prayacchet
yasmāt bhīṣā niṣīdasi tatas naḥ abhayamkṛdhi
prajābhyaḥ sarvābhyaḥ mḷa namaḥ rudrāya mīḍhuṣe
iti ārdra daṇḍena utthāpya audasthāt devī aditiḥ āyuḥ yajñapati avadhāt
indrāya kṛṇvatī bhāgam mitrāya varuṇāya ca
haviṣi skanna ia chāyam vaḥ yayoḥ ojasā skabhita ā rajāṃsi vīryebhiḥ vīra tama āśaviṣṭhā
yā a patyete apratītā sahobhiḥ viṣṇū agan vruṇā pūrva hūtau
divam devān tṛtīyam yajñaḥ agāt tatas mā draviṇam aṣṭu antarikṣam pitṝn tṛtīyam yajñaḥ agāt tatas mā draviṇam aṣṭu pṛthivīm manuṣyān tṛtīyam yajñaḥ agāt tatas mā draviṇam aṣṭu iti anumantrayeta
yat brāhmaṇaḥ jugupsuḥ na bhakṣayet etat duṣṭasya lakṣaṇam
tasmin dravye a vidyamāne yat sāma anyatamam manyeta tat pratinidadhyāt
a pratta daivate duṣṭena āvṛttiḥ asti hautrasya anyat haviḥ saṃskṛtya prayacchet devatāyai
na āvṛttiḥ pratta doṣe asti lupyate sviṣṭakṛt iḍam bhakṣāḥ ca
anyāsu devatāsu iṣṭāsu duṣṭena vā aśeṣavati tantre pradānam āvartate
kṛtasya anāvṛttiḥ guṇa lope samnipāta pradhāna tvāt
anyābhyaḥ gṛhīte anyāsu vā āvāhitāsu coditābhyaḥ prayacchet ājyena āvāhitāḥ yajet
iṣṭi paśubandheṣu some ca prāyaścittam brahmā ājuhoti
ṛgvede ced doṣaḥ syāt bhūḥ svāhā iti gārhapatye
yajurvede ced bhuvaḥ svāhā iti anvāhāryapacane
sāmavede ced svar svāhā iti āhavanīye
bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar svāhā iti ajñāpayāne doṣe
na a homena an ijyayā vā agnīn utsṛjet
prāyaścittam tu kṛtvā atītāni karmāṇi pratinidadhyāt pratinidadhyāt
yat anyat māṃsa lavaṇa mithuna māṣebhyaḥ yena ca dravyeṇa yakṣyamāṇaḥ syāt
agnīn anvādadhīta eṣṭi paśubandha iṣu pūrvedyus
mahāvyāhṛtīnām vā āsthāne catasraḥ vihavyasya ānupūrvyeṇa
apanaḥ śośucat agham iti sapta agne naya yaḥ tvā hṛdā tvam naḥ agne adharāt iti vā daśabhiḥ
pra agnaye vācam imam stomam iti ca aupasthānam sūktābhyām
dakṣiṇa agneḥ purastāt śūrpam sthālīm sphyam pātrīm ulūkhala musale ca saṃsādya
gārhapatyasya paścāt dakṣiṇa agneṣu kuśeṣu sphyam nidhāya
ācya savyam jānu nīcā muṣṭinā vrīhīn gṛhṇāti pitṝn dhyāyan

yathā adhas bila śritaḥ sasyāt patnyā asakṛt phalīkṛtān dakṣiṇa agnau śrapayitvā abhighārya pratyañcam udvāsya avasavi parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya dakṣiṇam jānu ācya yajña aupavītī prān āsīnaḥ mekṣaṇena juhoti
agnaye kavyavāhanāya svāhā somāya pitṛmate svāhā yamāya aṅgirasvate pitṛmate svāhā iti
mekṣaṇam anuprahṛtya dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇa agneḥ apahatā asura ārakṣāṃsi vediṣadaiti sphyena unmṛjya abhyukṣya
ye rūpāṇi pratimuñcamānāḥ asurāḥ santaḥ svadhayā caranti
parāpuraḥ nipuraḥ ye bharanti agniḥ tān lokāt praṇudāti asmāt
iti ulmukam unmṛṣṭasya dakṣiṇa ardhe nidhāya mūle kuśān sakṛt lūnān unmṛṣṭe nidhāya asau avane nikṣvaye ca tvām atra anu iti pituḥ nāma ādiśya kuśeṣu apaḥ niṣiñcati avācīna pāṇinā
asau etat teye ca tvām atra anu iti piṇḍa anyathā avanejitam nidhāya
tebhyaḥ vā apitā a tebhyaḥ putraḥ
atra pitaraḥ mādayadhvam yathābhāgam pitaraḥ āvṛṣāyadhvam iti
amīmadanta pitaraḥ yathābhāgam avīvṛṣata ed pratiparyāvṛtya
namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ jīvāya namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ śoṣāya
namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ ghorāya namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ rasāya
namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ balāya namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ mṛtyave
namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ manyave namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ svadhāyai
namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ pitaraḥ namaḥ vaḥ
ye atra pitaraḥ pitaraḥstha yūyam teṣām śreṣṭhāḥ bhūyāstha
yaiḥ ha pitaraḥ manuṣyau ayam teṣām śreṣṭhāḥ abhūyāsma
yā atra pitaraḥ svadhā āyuṣmākam sā
yai ha pitaraḥ edhatuḥ asmākam sa
etat vaḥ pitaraḥ vāsaḥ vadhvam pitaraḥ eti trīṇi sūtrāṇi upanyasya
ūrjam vahantīḥ amṛtam ghṛtam payaḥ kīlālam parisrutam
svadhā stha tarpayata anaḥpitṝn iti udaka śeṣam ninīya
madhyama piṇḍam patnī putra kāmā prāśnīyāt
etena eva dharmeṇa anāhita agneḥ piṇḍapitṛyajñaḥ kriyeta
bṛhaspatiḥ brahmā sa yajñam pātu sa yajñapatim samām pātu bṛhaspatiḥ daivaḥ brahma aham mānuṣaḥ bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar om iti upaviśya
sarvāsu gatiṣu yathā vrajanti anyathā tatas pratyāyanti
karma prasavāya āmantritaḥ om iti uktvā yathākarma prasauti
iṣṭa i ca sviṣṭakṛtyāḥ anuyāja prasavena visargaḥ
mitrasya tvā a cakṣuṣā pratīkṣa eti prāśitram pratīkṣya
devasya tvā savituḥ prasave aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām pratigṛhṇāmi iti prtigṛhya
pṛthivyāḥ tvā nābhau sādayāmi adityāḥ upasthe eti prāc daṇḍam sthaṇḍile nidhāya
upa kaniṣṭhikayā aṅguṣṭhena ca prāśitram gṛhītvā
agneḥ tvā āsyena prāśnāmi iti prāśya a saṃkhādan
prāṇa pā asi prāṇam me pā hi iti nāsike mukham ca
cakṣuṣpāḥ asi cakṣuḥ me pāhi iti cakṣuṣī
śrotra pā asi śrotram mepā hi iti śrotre
indrasya tvā jaṭhare sādayāmi iti nābhim
śrotra pā asi śrotram mepā hi iti śrotre
indrasya tvā jaṭhare sādayāmi iti nābhim
kaḥ adāt kasmā adāt kāmaḥ adāt kāmāya adāt
kāmaḥ dātā a kāmaḥ pratigrahītā a kāmaḥ etat te iti anvāhāryam pratigṛhya
deva savitar etam te yajñam prāhuḥ bṛhaspataye brahmaṇe tena yajñamavatena yajñapatim tena māmavadevena savitrā prasūta iti japitvā om pratiṣṭhā eti prasauti
adabdhena tvā cakṣuṣā avapaśyāmi rāyaspoṣāya suprajāstvāya su vīryāya agneḥ jihvā asi suhūḥ devebhyaḥ dhāmne dhāmne me bhava yajuṣe yajuṣā iti ājyam avekṣate patnī
tejaḥ asi śukram asi amṛtam asi vaiśvadevam asi iti āsannam vedau yajamānaḥ
dhruvā asadat ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke iti viṣṇo upāhi pāhi yajñam pāhi yajñapatim iti āsannāni havīṃṣi abhimṛśya
vṛṣṭiḥ asi pāpmanām me vṛśca vidyā asi vidyame pāpmānam iti ācamya
agne vratapate vratam cariṣyāmi tat śakeyam tat me rādhyatām
idma aham anṛtāt satyam upaimi iti āhavanīye samidham ādhāya vācam yacchati
an upadasyam anna adyam āpnavāni iti ākāśam samudram vā
mahi idam indra aindriyam dadhātu asmān rāyaḥ maghavānaḥ sacantām
asmākam santu āśiṣaḥ satyānaḥ sanu āśiṣaḥ
bradhna pinvasva prāṇam mepāhi prajām mepāhi paśūn mepāhi brahma medhukṣva kṣatram medhukṣva viśaḥ medhukṣva diśām klṛptiḥ asi diśaḥ me kalpantam akalpantām mediśaḥ tāsu klṛptā asuḥ rādhyāsam
atra pitaraḥ mādayadhvam yathābhāgam pitaraḥ āvṛṣāyadhvam iti barhiṣadam puroḷāśam abhimṛśya
amīmadanta pitaraḥ yathābhāgam avīvṛṣata iti pratyavadhāya
prajāpateḥ bhāgaḥ asi ūrjasvān payasvān akṣitiḥ asi mām ekṣeṣṭhāḥ amutra amuṣmin loke eha ca iti anvāhāryam abhimṛśya

anuyājeṣu iṣṭeṣu vyūhita srucau agneḥ agnīṣomayoḥ ujjitim anūjjeṣam vājasya ā prasavena prohāmi iti uttānena dakṣiṇena juhūm prācīm agniḥ agnīṣomau tam apanudantu yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ vājasya enam prasavena apohāmi iti nīcāsavyena aupabhṛtam pratīcīm
an iṣṭe gṛhapatau gārhapatye sruveṇa juhoti
yam vām devāḥ akalpayan ūrjaḥ bhāgam śata kratū
idam vām tena prīṇāmi tasya tṛmpata mahā haa ahuhū svāhā

agne pṛthivyāḥ adhipate vāyo antarikṣasya adhipate savitar prasavānām adhipate sūrya nakṣatrāṇām adhipate soma oṣadhīnām adhipate tvaṣṭar samidhām rūpāṇām adhipate mitra satyānām adhipate varuṇa dharmāṇām adhipate indra jyeṣṭānām adhipate prajāpate prajānām adhipate devāḥ deveṣu parākramadhvam
prathamā dvitīye iṣu parākramadhvam iti evam eka auttaram ā ekādaśabhyaḥ

viśvedevāḥ trayastriṃśāḥ tris ekādaśinaḥ uttara uttaravartmānaḥ uttarasatvānaḥ viśve vaiśvānara viśve viśvamahasā ehamā avata asmin brahmaṇi asmin kṣatre asmin karmaṇi asyām āśiṣi asyām pratiṣṭhāyām asyām deva hūtyām ayam me kāmaḥ samṛdhyatām svāhā iti yad kāmaḥ bhavati
āpyāyatām dhruvā haviṣā ghṛtena yajñam yajñam pratidevay yaḍbhyaḥ
sūryāyai ūdhaḥ adityāḥ upastha uru dhārā pṛthivī yajñe asmin
sat asi sat me bhūyāḥ sarvam asi sarvam me bhūyāḥ pūrṇam asi pūrṇam me bhūyāḥ akṣitiḥ asi māme kṣeṣṭhāḥ amutra amuṣmin loke iha ca iti pūrṇapātram abhimṛśya diśaḥ vyudukṣati
dakṣiṇā diśā saha māsāḥ pitaraḥ mārjayantām
prācyā diśā saha gṛhāḥ paśavaḥ mārjayantām
ūrdhvayā diśā saha yajñaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ yajñapatiḥ mārjayantām iti
sakṛt sakṛt mantreṇa dvis dvis tūṣṇīm
acchā ayam vo yayoḥ ojasā iti prācīḥ ninīya audīcīḥ vā
samudram vaḥ prahiṇomi svāmi yonim abhigacchata
ariṣṭāḥ asmākam vīrāḥ amā aparā secinaḥ dhanam
sam indraṇaḥ samvarcasā payasā asam tanūbhiḥ agan mahi manasā asam śivena
tvaṣṭā asu datraḥ vidadhāturāya eti prāṇān
anu nas mārṣṭu tanvaḥ yad vil liṣṭam
dakṣiṇāt vedeḥ śroṇi deśāt ā āhavanīyāt
divi viṣṇuḥ vyakraṃsta jāgatena chandasā tamaham anuvyakraṃsitatas nirbhaktaḥ sa yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ iti abhyuddhṛtya dakṣiṇam pādam hīnataram savyam
antarikṣe viṣṇuḥ vyakran tatraiṣṭubhena chandasā iti dvitīyam
pṛthivyām viṣṇuḥ vyakraṃsta gāyatreṇa chandasā aiti tṛtīyam
dikṣu viṣṇuḥ vyakraṃsta anuṣṭubhena chandasā aiti tiryak vikrāmati
sam aham prajayā sammayā prajā sam aham rāyaspoṣeṇa sammayā rāyaspoṣaḥ vasuḥ yajñaḥ vasīyān bhūyāsam iti prān eva

svayambhūḥ asi śreṣṭhaḥ raśmiḥ āyuḥ dāḥ asya āyuḥ me dehi varcaḥ dāḥ asi varcaḥ medehi tanūpāḥ asi tanvam me pāhi idam aham ābhyaḥ digbhyaḥ asyai divaḥ asmāt antarikṣāt asmāt anna adyāt asyai pratiṣṭhāyai dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam nirbhajāmi nirbhaktaḥ dviṣan bhrātṛvyaḥ iti ādityam upasthāya
aindrīm āvṛtam āvarte ādityasya āvṛtam anvāvarte iti dakṣiṇam bāhum anvāvṛtya
agne gṛhapate sa gṛhapatiḥ aham tvayā agne gṛhapatinā bhūyāsam su gṛhapatiḥ tvam mayā agne gṛhapatinā bhūyāḥ
śatam himām ahyam amuṣya āditya putra nāmāni abhivyāhṛtya
bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar sam mā kāmena gamaya eti asya aṅgāram upaspṛśya
yajñaḥ babhūva sa ābabhūva sa prajajñe sa uvāvṛdhe punar
sa devānām adhipatiḥ babhūva saḥ asmān adhipatīn kṛṇotu
agne vratapate vratam acāriṣam tat daśakam tena arāt samyak eva asmi saḥ asmi iti āhavanīye samidham ādhāya
yonaḥ dūredveṣṭi yonaḥ anti samānaḥ niṣṭyaḥ araṇaḥ cit agne
idhmasya eva prakhyāyataḥ mātasya auccheṣi kiṃcana
ud vayam tad cakṣuḥ saṃdṛśaḥ te achitsiyat tetapaḥ tasmai te avṛkṣi iti ādityam upasthāya
idam haviḥ prajananam me astu daśa vīram sarva gaṇam svastaye
ātma sani prajā sani abhaya sani paśu sani loka sani
agniḥ prajām bahulām me karotu annam payaḥ retaḥ asmāsu dhatta
dadhikrāvṇaḥ akāriṣam iti vāsam bubhūṣan dadhi bhakṣam
sam yajñapatiḥ āśiṣā iti yajamāna bhāgam prāśnāti
samiṣṭa yajuṣā a saha pravasati juhoti
visamāpte ced abhipreyāt maraṇa antam eka aheṣu na asti tasya samāpanam
dakṣiṇasyām diśi dakṣiṇā pravaṇe deśe dakṣiṇa prāc pravaṇe prāc pravaṇena vā
purastāt āhavanīyam paścāt nidhāya gārhapatyam dakṣiṇatas dakṣiṇa agnim
antareṇa gārhapatyam dakṣiṇa agnim ca hṛtvā
dakṣiṇatas paścāt vāgām anustaraṇīm ajām vārohiṇīm dakṣiṇā mukhīm probhya
anvāhāryapacane kavauṣṇau kṛtvā atidrava eti ṛgbhyām pāṇyoḥ ādhāya
prāṇa āyatana iṣu hiraṇya śakalān kṛtvā
agneḥ varma eti vapayā mukham pracchādya
ayam vai tvat tvam asmāt ayam te yoniḥ tvam asi ayoniḥ
jātavedaḥ vahasva enam su kṛtāmi atra lokaḥ
ayam vai tvām ajanayat ayam tvat adhijāyatām asau svāhā iti upohanti agnibhiḥ
mā enam agnaḥ iti sampradīpte daśa japitvā a savya āvṛtaḥ an avekṣamāṇāḥ prāc udañcaḥ prakāmanti
āpohiṣṭhāḥ sanāca somaḥ iti udakam spṛśanti sūktābhyām anaman nimajjantaḥ a saṃdhāvamānāḥ
asau etat te iti ekam udaka añjalim pradāya
uda pātre dūrvā yava sarṣapāṇi opya ārdre gomaye nidhāya aśmanvatī iti abhyaktam aśmānam agnim uda pātram ca sammṛśanti
adhaḥśayyā haviṣya bhakṣa tā pratyūhanam ca karmaṇām vaitāna varjam eka rātram tri rātram nava rātram vā ava a saṃcayanāt vratāni
na agha ahā nivardhayeyuḥ iti hasmaāha kauṣītakiḥ
yam tvam agniḥ eti dvābhyām sa kṣīreṇa audakena asthīni nirvāpya
śarīreṣu adṛśyamāneṣu trīṇi ṣaṣṭi śatāni palāśa vṛntāni
puruṣa ākṛtim kṛtvā ūrṇā sūtraiḥ pariveṣṭya yava cūrṇaiḥ pralipya sarpiṣā abhyajya agnibhiḥ saṃkurvanti
icchan patnīm pūrva māriṇīm agnibhiḥ saṃskṛtya sāṃtapanena vā anyām ānīya tatas punar ādadhīta
ānaḍuham rohitam carma udaggrīvam prāc grīvam vā uttaraloma paścāt agneḥ upastīrya upaviśanti kuśān vā evam agrān
antareṇa agnim ca etān ca abhyaktma aśmānam nidhāya
paraitu mṛtyuḥ amṛtam me āgāt vaivasvataḥ naḥ abhayamkṛṇotu
yāḥ ca aruṇe daśa anvādhānā eti
yathā ahāni iti dakṣiṇam anvaṃsam dvābhyām samīkṣya
kuśaiḥ strīṇām akṣīṇi anakti imāḥ nārīḥ iti
sakṛt sakṛt mantreṇa dvis dvis tūṣṇīm
uttiṣṭha brahmaṇaspate iti dvābhyām brāhmaṇasya dakṣiṇam bāhum anvārabdhān uttiṣṭhataḥ anumantrayate
anaḍvān ahatam vāsaḥ kāṃsyaḥ ca dakṣiṇā
dakṣiṇatas vittam nivartadhvam iti sūktena pratyenāḥ pradakṣiṇam tris paryeti
śuddha pakṣe upoṣya puṣye nakṣatre prāc udīcyām diṣi
a gim mathitvā a prāñcam praṇīya
purastāt palāśa śākhām sa palāśām nikhāya
tam saṃjñapayanti prāc śirasam udak pādam pratyak śirasam vā udak pādam a ravamāṇam
yat paśuḥ māyum akṛtaurā uvāpadbhiḥ āhate
agniḥ mā tasmāt enasaḥ jātavedāḥ pramuñcatu
vapām uddhṛtya prakṣālya pūrve agnau śrapayitvā abhighārya udvāsya śivam śivam iti tris paryukṣya ājya āhutīḥ juhoti
tām ghṛtasya dhārayā ayuje samardhamīmaham svāhā
yasya edam sarvam tam imam havāmahe
trīṇi palāśa palāśāni madhyamāni saṃtṛḍya upastīrya
yāvatām aham īśe yāvantaḥ me amātyāḥ
tebhyaḥ tvā deva vandetebhyaḥ naḥ deva mṛḍa
veda te pitaram veda mātaram dyauḥ te pitā pṛthivī mātā
tasmai te deva bhavāya śarvāya paśupataye ugrāya devāya mahate devāya rudrāya īśānāya aśanaye svāhā iti vapām hutvā
darśāyate pratidarśāya svāhā iti uttarām ājya āhutim hutvā tathā eva paryukṣati
sthālīpākam yūṣam māṃsam ājyam iti samninīya śamyoḥ śamyoḥ iti tris paryukṣya juhoti
bhavāya svāhā śarvāya svāhā rudrāya svāhā īśānāya svāhā agnaye sviṣṭakṛte svāhā iti
bhavānyai svāhā śarvāṇyai svāhā rudrāṇyai svāhā īśānānyai svāhā agnāyyai svāhā iti
ṣaṣ ā vikartanāt palāśāni prāc udañci nidhāya
tad iṣu lohita miśram ūvadhyam avadhāya
āghoṣiṇyaḥ pratighoṣiṇyaḥ saṃghośiṇyaḥ vicinvatyaḥ śvasanāḥ kravyādaḥ eṣavaḥ bhāgaḥ tam juṣadhvam svāhā iti

bhūpate bhuvapate bhuvanapate bhūtapate bhūtānām pate mahataḥ bhūtasya pate mṛḍanaḥ dvipade ca catuṣpade ca paśave mṛḍanaḥ ca dvipadaḥ ca catuṣpadaḥ ca paśūnyaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ durāpūraḥ asi sacchāyaḥ adhināmena abhimānena
tasyate dhanuḥ hṛdayam manaiṣavaḥ cakṣuḥ visargaḥ tam tvā tathā veda namaste astu somaḥ tvā avatu mām āhiṃsīḥ
yau araṇyepatayaḥ otu ṛ kau jañjabhatau iva
kadrudrāya emārudrāya ātepitarimārudrāya sthiradhanvane etica sūktāni
upākaraṇam prokṣaṇam paryagnikraṇam iti āvṛtaḥ pāśubandhikyaḥ
palāśa śākhā iti devatāyai vapām devatāyai haviḥ sviṣṭakṛte ca anyeṣām paśūnām
āgneyaḥ saumyaḥ ca ājyabhāgau devatāyai vapām devatāyai haviḥ sviṣṭakṛte ca ājya āhutiḥ ca anumataye sthālīpākānām
ṣaṭ arghyāḥ bhavanti ācārya ṛtvij śvaśuraḥ rājā a snātakaḥ priyā eti
udanmukhaḥ prānmukhaḥ vā aham varṣma sādṛśānām vidyutām iva sūryaḥ
idam tam adhitiṣṭhāmi yaḥ asmān abhidāsati
virājaḥ dohaḥ asi virājaḥ doham aśīya mayi padyāyai virājaḥ dohaḥ iti pādyam pratigṛhya
ācamanīyam iti ukta āpohiṣṭhīyābhiḥ tisṛbhiḥ eka ekayā ācamya
madhuparkaḥ eti uktaḥ yathā prāśitram tathā pratīkṣya
pratigṛhya savye pāṇau kṛtvā aṅguṣṭhena upakaniṣṭhikayā ca pūrva ardhāt upahatya pūrva ardhe kāṃsi asya nilimpati vasavaḥ tvā agni rājānaḥ bhakṣayantu iti
pitaraḥ tvā ayam a rājānaḥ bhakṣayantu iti dakṣiṇa ardhāt dakṣiṇa ardhe
ādityāḥ tvā varuṇa rājānaḥ bhakṣayantu iti parśaardhāt paścaardhena
rudrāḥ tvā indra rājānaḥ bhakṣayantu iti uttara ardhāt uttara ardhe
viśve tvā devāḥ prajāpati rājānaḥ bhakṣayantu iti mādhyāt ūrdhvam
sakṛt sakṛt mantreṇa dvis dvis tūṣṇīm
mātā rudrāṇām iti japitvā utsṛjata tṛṇāni attu iti vā
kūrcaḥ pādyam arghyam ācamanīyam madhuparkaḥ gauḥ iti vedayeta vedayeta
ārṣeyān yūnaḥ anūcānān ṛtvijaḥ vṛṇīte somena yakṣyamāṇaḥ
candramāḥ mā idam eva brahmā iti upāṃśu tvammānuṣa iti uccais
agniḥ medā eva uhotā atvam mānuṣaḥ
vāyuḥ medā eva adhvaryuḥ tvam mānuṣaḥ
prajāpatiḥ me dā evaḥsadasyaḥ tvam mānuṣaḥ
ṛtavaḥ mā idaivya ahotrāśaṃsinaḥ yūyam mānuṣāḥ

bhargam mevocaḥ bhadram mevocaḥ bhūtim mevocaḥ śriyam mevocaḥ yaśaḥ mevocaḥ mayi bhargaḥ mayi bhadram mayi bhūtiḥ mayi śrīḥ mayi yaśaḥ iti vṛtaḥ japitvā a kaccinna a hīna anudeśya nyasta ārtvijya nīta dakṣiṇānām anyatamaḥ eti pṛṣṭvā a pratigṛhṇotaḥ upratigṛhṇāti
anubruvan yatra hotā āhavanīyam ādityam apaḥ ca paśyet tat brahmavarcasa kāmasya
śuddha pakṣe dīkṣā puṇye nakṣatre samāpanam ca

upahūtaḥ ayam yajamānaḥ asya yajñasya āgurau dṛcam aśīya iti āśāste ayam yajamānaḥ asya yajñasya āgurau dṛcam aśīya iti āśāste iti āśiṣām sthāna aiḍāyām sūktavāke ca prāk tārtīyasavanikyāḥ puroḷāśa eḍāyāḥ
na sūktavāke yajamānasya nāma gṛhṇāti prāk savanīyāt
adhvayuḥ manuḥ ārabhya audagrabhaṇāni juhvatam yajamānam manaḥ me manasā dīkṣatām vān me vācā dīkṣatām prāṇaḥ me prāṇena dīkṣatām cakṣuḥ me cakṣuṣā dīkṣatām śrotram me śrotreṇa dīkṣatām iti
prāṇam dīkṣām upaimi iti dakṣiṇa agnim
aparimitāḥ dīkṣāḥ tāsām apavarge prāyaṇīyā iṣṭiḥ
pathyām svastim agnim somam savitāram ca ājyena aditim caruṇā
tat savituḥ vareṇī amyaimā viśvā jātāni
krītvā rājānam ādhāya śakaṭe somāya paryuhyamāṇāya eti uktaḥ
bhadrāt abhi śreyaḥ prehi bṛhaspatiḥ puraetāte astu
atha īm avasya vara ā pṛthivyāḥ āre śatrūn kṛṇuhi sarva vīraḥ
imām dhiyam śikṣamāṇasya vaneṣu vi antarikṣam soma yāste iti catasraḥ anusamyan antareṇa vartmanī
śālām agreṇa śakaṭam avasthāpya prapādayanti rājānam
agreṇa āhavanīyam dakṣiṇā tiṣṭhan nāgan devaḥ eti paridhāya
madantībhiḥ udaka arthaḥ atas ūrdhvam ā agnīṣoma praṇayanāt
viṣṇoḥ nu kam pra tad viṣṇuḥ
hotāram citra ratham yastvā āsu aśva eti sviṣṭakṛtaḥ
anādhṛṣṭam asi anādhṛṣyam devānām ojaḥ anabhiśasti abhiśasti pāḥ
an abhiśastenyam añjasā satyam upageṣam suvitema adha aiti sa hiraṇyam dhrauvam ājyam pātrī stham barhiṣi āsannam tānūnaptram samavamṛśya
upaspṛśya agreṇa āhavanīyam parītya aṃśūn upaspṛśantaḥ rājānam āpyāyayante
aṃśuḥ aṃśuṣṭe deva soma āpyāyatām indrāya eka dhana vide
ā tubhyam indraḥ pyāyatām ā tvam indrāya pyāyasva
āpyāyaya asmān sakhīn sanyā medhayā svasti te
deva soma sutyām udṛcam aśīya eti
yam ādityāḥ aṃśum āpyāyayanti yam akṣitim akṣitayaḥ pibanti
tena naḥ rājā varuṇaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ āpyāyayantu bhuvanasya gopāḥ
upaspṛśya dakṣiṇa uttānān pāṇīn prastare nidhāya nihnuvate savya uttānān aparaahṇe
eṣṭāraḥ ayaḥ preṣa ibhagāya ṛtam ṛta vādibhyaḥ namaḥ udyāvāpṛthivībhyām iti
mahāvīra pātreṣu sādyamāneṣu pūrvayā dvārā śālām prapadya
uttareṇa āhavanīyam kharau pātrāṇi ca gatvā
an avānam ekaikām sa praṇavām abhiṣṭauti
brahma jajñānam prathamam purastāt visīmataḥ surucaḥ venaḥ āvaḥ
sa budhnyāḥ upamāḥ asya viṣṭhāḥ sataḥ ca yonim asataḥ ca vivaḥ
iyam pitre rāṣṭryā iti agre prathamāya januṣe bhūmaneṣṭhāḥ
tasmai etam su rucam hvāra mahyam gharmam śrīṇanti prathamasya dhāseḥ
abhityam devma savitā aramoṇyoḥ kavi kratum
arcāmi satya savam ratna dhām abhi priyam matim kavim
hiraṇya pāṇiḥ amimīta sukratuḥ kṛpā svastṛpā svar iti vā
bhavānaḥ agne sumanāḥ tapoṣu agne yonaḥ sanutyā iti aṅgāreṣu upohyamāneṣu
pataṅgam aktam srakvā id rapsasya eti sūkte
viyat pavitram dhiṣaṇā atanvata gharmam śocantam praṇava iṣu vibhrataḥ
samudre antarāyavaḥ vicakṣaṇam tris ahnaḥ nāma sūryasya manvata
ayam vena eti sūkta mnāke suparṇam iti uddhṛtya
bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ iti vīra kāmāyai vīramdhyāyāt
sarvam īḍet yāvī iyam utsṛjya vācam
uttamām pariśiṣya rucitaḥ gharmaḥ iti ukte arūrucat iti abhiṣṭutya
upaspṛśya utthāya avakāśānām anuvākena mahāvīram upasthāya upaspṛśya upaviśati
samīvat saṃ saṃvatsā eva eti upasṛjyamānāyām
yaḥ teḥ stana eti stanam vatse abhipadyamāne
namasā id upasīdata saṃjānānā iti upasīdati
samiddhaḥ agniḥ aśvinā a taptaḥ uvām gharmaḥ āgatam
vinākam akhyat savitā adamūnāḥ an udyāvāpṛthivī su praṇīte
āsutesiñcata śriyam an ūnam aśvinoḥ ṛṣiḥ iti āsicyamānayoḥ
uduṣya devaḥ savitā hiraṇyayāḥ iti udyamyamāne
tapta uvām gharmaḥ nakṣati sva hotā apravām adhvaryuḥ carati prayasvān
madhoḥ dugdhasya aśvinātanāya vītampa ātma payasā ausriyāyāḥ
gharmasya agne vīhi iti anuvaṣaṭkaroti iti pūrvaahṇe
yat usriyāsu āhutam ghṛtam payaḥ ayam suvām aśvinā bhāga āgatam
mādhvī dhartārā vidathasya sat patī taptam gharmam pibatam rocane divaḥ
svāhākṛtaḥ śuciḥ deveṣu gharmaḥ yaḥ aśvinoḥ camasaḥ deva pānaḥ
tam īm viśve amṛtāsaḥ juṣāṇā gandharvasya prati āsrnā ari hanti
tam gha imitthā iti prāgāthikām āvartsyati
hutam haviḥ mahdu haviḥ indratame agnau aśyāmate deva gharma madhumataḥ vājavataḥ pitumate iti bhakṣa mantraḥ
ā yasmin sapta vāsava ārohanti pūrvya āruhaḥ
ṛṣiḥ hi dīrghaśruttama aindrasya ghaḥ armaḥ atithiḥ
sutyā iva ahani āgnīdhrīye pravargyaḥ stute bahiṣpavamāne mādhyandine ca
prastare nihnutya aupasadā ācaranti sa pravargye pravargyam saṃsthāpya
upasadyāya et pūrva ahṇā itisraḥ sāmidhenīḥ anavānam ekaikām sa praṇavām tris tris āha
imām me agne samidham iti tisraḥ apara ahṇe
tṛtīyena pūrvasya avacanena uttarām saṃdhāya avasyati
agnim āvaha somam āvaha viṣṇum āvaha iti praṇavena saṃdhāya
viparyāsaḥ a para ahṇā yājyā puronuvākyānām
imām me agne samidham iti dvitīye ahani pūrva ahṇā itisraḥ sāmidhenīḥ
dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasya auttaram vartma uttarasya ca dakṣiṇam antareṇa tiṣṭhan havirdhānābhyām pravartyamānābhyām iti uktaḥ
apeta ujanya bhaya manya janya ca vṛtrahan
iti dakṣiṇena prapadena pratyañcam logma apāsya
dyāvānaḥ pṛthivī imam tayoḥ id ghṛtavat yamā iva eti dakṣiṇasya auttaram vartma upaniśritaḥ anusamyan
yatra tiṣṭhan prathamām anvavocat tat sthitvā utsṛjyate
tad prabhṛti ā anubandhyāyāḥ saṃsthānāt antareṇa cātvāla autkarau tīrtham
uttareṇa āgnīdhrīyam dhiṣṇyam sadaḥ ca gatvā
uttareṇa adhvaryu yajña pātrāṇi ca pūrvayā dvārā śālām prapadya
sāvīḥ hi deva prathamāya pitre vā ṛṣmāṇam asmai varimāṇam asmai
atha asmabhyam savitar sarvatātā dive diva āsuva a bhūri paśvaḥ
hotā devaḥ patvā agne iti tṛcau
bhūtānām garbham ādadhe eti garbha kāmāyai garbham dhyāyāt uttareṇa sadaḥ anusamyan
uttareṇa agnim somaḥ jigāti iti tisraḥ anusamyan
dakṣiṇe havirdhāne rājani sannā uttaratas dakṣiṇā atiṣṭhan śyena ūna yonim gaṇānām tvā astabhnāt dyām
savya āvṛt havirdhānayoḥ pūrvasyām dvāri upaviśati
dakṣiṇa āvṛt aparayā dvārā niṣkramya savya āvṛt uttareṇa havirdhāne gatvā tatra eva upaviśati
yūpāya ājyamānāya eti uktaḥ añjanti tvām iti anvāha
ucchrīyamāṇāya iti uktā ucchrayasva vanaspate samiddhasya śrayamāṇaḥ purastāt jātaḥ jāyate ūrdhva ūṣuṇaḥ ūrdhva ūnaḥ
parivīyamāṇāya iti uktaḥ yuvāsu vāsāḥ iti paridhāya tiṣṭhan anvāha agnimanthanīyāḥ
yajñena yajñam iti paridhāya sāmidhenīḥ anvāha
mitrāvaruṇayoḥ tvā praśāstoḥ praśiṣā prayacchāmi yajñasya ariṣṭyāḥ iti yajamānaḥ maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍam prayacchati
tena eva mantreṇa yathāartham pratigṛhya dakṣiṇena hotāram dakṣiṇa āvṛt pūrvaḥ pratipadyate
uttareṇa havirdhāne dakṣiṇena āgnīdhrīyam dhiṣṇyam gatvā pūrvayā dvārā āsadaḥ prapadya svasya dhiṣṇyasya paścāt upaviśya ekādaśa prayājān yajati
prahāṇaḥ tiṣṭhan daṇḍe parākramya samidhaḥ preṣya iti uktaḥ hotā ayakṣat agnim samidhā iti preṣyati
samiddhaḥ adya manuṣaiḥ eti vā sarveṣām
daśabhiḥ caritvā paryagnaye iti uktaḥ agniḥ hotā anaḥ adhvaraḥ iti tisraḥ anvāha
upapreṣya hotar iti uktaḥ ajait agniḥ iti upapraiṣam āha
daivyāḥ śamitā rautaca manuṣyāḥ ārabhadhvam upanayata medhyāḥ duraḥ āśāsānāḥ medha patibhyām medham
pra asmā agnim bharataḥ tṛṇīta barhiḥ anu enam mātā manyatām anu pitā anu bhrātā asagarbhyaḥ anu sakhā sayūthyaḥ
udīcīnān asya padaḥ nidhattāt sūryam cakṣuḥ gamayatāt vātam prāṇam anvavasṛjatāt antarikṣam asum diśaḥ śrotram pṛthivīm śarīram
ekadhā asya tvacam ācchyatāt purā nābhyāḥ apiśasaḥ vapām utkhidatāt antarā iva ūṣmāṇam vārayadhvāt
śyena masya vakṣaḥ kṛṇutāt praśasā bāhū śalā doṣaṇī kaśyapa aiva aṃsa acchidre śroṇīka vaṣā ūrū srekaparṇa aṣṭhīvantā
ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ asya vaṅkrayaḥ tāḥ anuṣṭhyauccyāvayatāt gātram gātram asya anūnam kṛṇutāt
adhrigo śamīdhvam su śami śamīdhvam śamīdhvam aghrigo iti tris paridhāya aupāṃśu japa ytu bhāva pāpaḥ ca eti
stokebhyaḥ iti uktaḥ ujuṣa sva saprathastamam imam naḥ yajñam iti ca sūktam anvāha
svāhākṛtibhyaḥ iti uktaḥ hotā ayakṣat agnim svāhā ājyasya eti preṣyati
antareṇa auttamam prayājam vapām ca vāgyamanam
yathāprapannam upaniṣkramya edam āpaiti tṛcena cātvālau upaspṛśya utsṛjyete
paśupuroḍāśāya āmantritau āgnīdhrīyam uttareṇa hotuḥ ca gatvā yathādhiṣṇyam upaviśataḥ
na nigamāḥ santi paśu tantre codyamānānām
hotā ayakṣat agnim puroḷāśasya eti praiṣaḥ
manotāyai haviṣā iti uktaḥ tvam hi agne prathamaḥ manotā iti manotāsu uktam anvāha
agnīṣoma haviṣā eti ardharcā iya ājyāya ā viramati ā avasā homāt
hotā ayakṣat agnim sviṣṭakṛtam iti praiṣaḥ
devam barhiḥ su devam devaiḥ iti an avānam preṣyati
devaḥ vanaspatiḥ vasu vane vasudhā yasya vetu
devam barhiḥ vāritīnām vasu vane vasudhā yasya avetu
sūktā preṣya eti uktaḥ agni madya hotāram iti sūktavāka praiṣam āha
śamyoḥ ukte yathāprapannam upaniṣkramya utsṛjyate maitrāvaruṇaḥ
śālām hotā gatvā a patnīsamyāja antam naktam saṃsthāpayati saṃsthāpayati
yathāartham uttarasyām tatau artha vikārasya autpatti rūpeṇa anabhidhānāt śabda vikāram ūham bruvate
barhiḥ cakṣuḥ śrotram prāṇaḥ asuḥ tvat nābhiḥ ūṣmā ajñātināma ani śyenam śalā kaśyapāka vaṣa asra ikaparṇa ūvadhya go hama snā iti yathā samāmnātam
ekadhā ekadhā ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ iti samāsena vā
eka devata dvi devatayoḥ ca bahu vat
eva eti akāreṇa saṃdhānam devatā nāmadheyasya svara ādeḥ dvi devatyasya
agni praṇayana ādayaḥ hṛdaya śūla antāḥ paśavaḥ agnīṣomīya savanīyau parihāpya
anyatra ca agnīṣomīyāt sūktavākena āma grahaṇam
prātaranuvāka prabhṛti ādi pradiṣṭa aniśastra anuvacanayoḥ sūktāni
mahārātre prātaranuvākāya āmantritaḥ agreṇa āgnīdhrīyam dhiṣṇyam tiṣṭhan prapadaḥ japati

bhūḥ prapadye bhuvaḥ prapadye svar prapadye bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar prapadya om prapadye vācam ṛcam prapadye manaḥ yajuḥ prapadye sāma prāṇam prapadye cakṣuḥ śrotram prapadye namaḥ devebhyaḥ namaḥ devatābhyaḥ namaḥ mahate devāya namaḥ gandharva apsarobhyaḥ namaḥ sarpa deva janebhyaḥ namaḥ bhūtāya namaḥ bhaviṣyate namaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ prati namaskārebhyaḥ vaḥ api namaḥ
asyām me prācyām diśi sūryaḥ ca candraḥ ca adhipatī sūryaḥ ca candraḥ camā etasyai diśaḥ pātām sūryam ca candram ca sa devatānām ṛcchatu yono atas abhidāsati iti prācīm
asyām me dakṣiṇasyām diśi yamaḥ ca mṛtyuḥca adhipatī yamaḥ ca mṛtyuḥca mā etasyai diśaḥ pāta am yamam ca mṛtyum ca sa devatānām ṛcchatu yaḥ naḥ atas abhidāsati iti dakṣiṇām
asyām me pratīcyām diśi mitraḥ ca varuṇaḥ ca adhipatī mitraḥ ca varuṇaḥ cama etasyai diśaḥ pātām mitram ca vruṇam ca sa devatānām ṛcchatu yonaḥ jataḥ abhidāsati iti pratīcīm
asyām mā audīcyām diśi somaḥ ca rudraḥ ca adhipatī somaḥ ca rudraḥ camā etasyai diśaḥpātām somam ca rudram ca sa devatānām ṛcchatu yonaḥ atas abhidāsati iti savya āvṛt udīcīm
asyām mā ūrdhvāyām diśi bṛhaspatiḥ ca aindraḥ ca adhipatībṛhaspatiḥ ca aindraḥ camā etasyai diśaḥpātām bṛhaspatim ca aindram ca sa devatānām ṛcchatu yaḥ naḥ atas abhidāsati iti pra an ūrdhvām
asmin mā aṅgarikṣā iva āyuḥ ca vṛṣṭiḥ ca adhipatī vāyuḥ ca vṛṣṭiḥ ca mā etasyai diśaḥ pātām vāyum ca vṛṣṭim ca sa devatānām ṛcchatu yaḥ naḥ atas abihdā sati iti antarikṣam
asyām me pṛthivyām agniḥ ca annam ca adhipatī agniḥ ca annam ca mā etasyai diśaḥ pātām agnim ca annam ca sa devatānām ṛcchatu yono atas abhidāsati iti pṛthivīm

bṛhat rathantare maūrū vāmadevyam ātmāyajñāyajñīyam pratiṣṭhā bhūḥ aham bhuvar aham svar aham aśmā aham aśmā khaṇaḥ su trāmāṇam iti japitvā dakṣiṇa āvṛt āgnīdhrīye bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar svāhā agnaye svāhā uṣase svāhā aśvibhyām svāhā aśvibhyām svāhā sarasvatyai svāhā juṣāṇāni mahāṃsi savanāni ājyasya vyantu svāhā iti sruveṇa hutvā savya āvṛt havirdhānayoḥ pūrvasyām dvāri upaviśati
devebhyaḥ prātaryau abhyaiti uktaḥ himkṛtya madhyamayā vācā prātaranuvākam anvāha
trīṇi padāni samasya paṅktīnām avasyet dvābhyām praṇuyāt
agni ika dāta ānuṣa giti pañca
sa sa sya yat iti pañca
yat adya sthaḥ parāvatī iti sūkte
stuṣe nara eti sūkte parihāpya pañca padām
āvāmrathaḥ urodasī bat badhāna eti pañca sūktāni
ayam vām madhumattamaḥ eti prathamā tṛtīyā pañcamī ca
chandaḥ anantareṇa vā pratipad samārohaṇīyānām ca etasya samāmnāyasya trīṇi ṣaṣṭi śatāni
purā udayāt upāṃśum hoṣyanti iti sa kālaḥ paridhānasya
apaiṣya hotar iti uktaḥ pra deva trā eti dvādaśīm parihāpya
nava anūcya ekādaśīm āhutau apsu hūyamānāyām
ādhenavaiti āyatīṣu sarvām uktvā praṇavena avasyati
adhvaryave eṣīḥ apaḥ iti adhvaryum pṛcchati
pratyuktaḥ nigadam tāsu adhvaryava ādhau aindrāyasomam ūrjasvantam mahdumantam tṛṣṭivanim vasumate rudravate ādityavate ṛbhumate vibhumate vājavate bṛhaspatimate viśvadevyāvate
yasya pītvā amada aindraḥ vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanat
u utthāya adhvaryum anvāvṛtya auttarām adhyardhām anūcya
prāṇam me pāhi prāṇam me jinva svāhā tvā su bhava sūryāya eti upāṃśum hūyamānam anuprāṇiti
apānam me pāhi apānam me jinva svāhā tvā su bhava sūryāya eti antaryāmam anvavāniti
dakṣiṇaḥ a utbrahmā maitrāvaruṇaḥ ca upaviśya
āyuṣmatyaḥ ṛcaḥ umā gāta tanūpāḥ sāmnaḥ stuta devasya savituḥ prasava iti japitvā
āyuṣmatyaḥ ṛcaḥ umā gāta tanūpāḥ sāmnaḥ stuta devasya savituḥ prasava iti japitvā
asataḥ mā asat gamayatama soma jyotiḥ gamaya antāt mā anantam gamaya mṛtyoḥ mā amṛtam gamaya iti yajamānaḥ pavamānān upasariṣyan
śyenaḥ asi patvā gāyatra chandāḥ anutvā ārabhe svastim ā sampāraya asya yajñasya oṭṭacam iti stute bahiṣpavamāne
suparṇaḥ asi patvā triṣṭubh chandāḥ iti mādhyaṃdine
sakhā asi patvā jagat chandāḥ iti ārbhave

upahūtāḥ devāḥ asya somasya pavamānasya vicakṣaṇasya bhakṣa upamām deva āhvayantām asya somasya pavamānasya vicakṣaṇasya bhakṣe manasā tvā bhakṣayāmi vācā tvā bhakṣayāmi prāṇena tvā bhakṣayāmi cakṣuṣā tvā bhakṣayāmi śrotreṇa tvā bhakṣayāmi iti stute bahiṣpavamānā hotā
eka yūpeṣu aikādaśineṣu āvartate parivyayaṇīyā raśanā pṛthaktvāt tris tris
pūrvedyus ucchriteṣu a parivīyamāṇeṣu pūrvayā paridadhyāt
saṃtāna arthaḥ vā ardharcena eva kāṅkṣet
indram avasumantam āvaha aindram rudravantam āvaha aindram ādityavantam ṛbhumantam vibhumantam vājavantam bṛhaspatimantam viśvadevyāvantam āvaha etisavana devatāḥ
adhvaryu sammṛśya pravara ānupūrvyeṇa pravṛta āhutī juhoti
juṣṭā u vācobhūyāsam juṣṭā u vācaspate idam vidaivi
vāgyatte vācaḥ madhumattamam tasmin naḥ adya dhāt dhāḥ
agne na yaiti tisraḥ bhuvaḥ yajñasya pravaḥ śukrāya prakāravaiti āgneyasya
ānaḥ divaḥ bṛhataḥ parvatāḥ dā sarasvatīm devayantaḥ sarasvatī abhinaḥ pāvīravī kanyā prakṣodaṣā imā ājuhvānāḥ iti sārasvatasya
tvam soma pracikitaḥ tvam imāḥ oṣadhīḥ somaḥ dhenumyātedhāmāni divyaṣāh hamyutsuyātedhāmāni haviḥ eṣā iti saumyasya
pūṣā imāḥ āśāḥ prapathe pathām pathaḥ pathaḥ śukram te yāḥ te pūṣan pūṣā su bandhuḥ iti pauṣṇasya
ā daivyā vedhasam bṛhaspatiḥ samajayat sahi śuciḥ sa suṣṭubhāsa ṛkvatāsa ānoyonim iti bārhaspatyasya
viśve adya marutaḥ viśvaūtīyam devāsaḥ avatha viśve devāḥ gṛṇuta ye ke ca jmā te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāḥ sa ūmāḥ stīrṇe barhiṣi iti vaiśvadevasya
indram naraindraḥ rāja aindra kṣatram urumna ānaḥ viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ āte śuṣmaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ iti aindrasya
gomat aśvāvat haye naraḥ śucī voarāi vaidyāvaḥśarma yūyam asmān iti mārutasya
ubhau ām a vṛtra haṇā tāyodhiṣṭham śucimnu gīrbhiḥ vipraḥ pracarṣaṇibhyaḥ iti aindrāgnasya
ānaḥ devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇaḥ ā devaḥ yātu savitā yantraiḥ vāmam adyayā ite panthāḥ asmabhyam tat divā iti sāvitrasya
astabhnāt dyām tat tvāyām yavate heḍaḥ eva āvandasva emām dhiyam śikṣamāṇasya ud uttamam varuṇa iti vāruṇasya
janīyante eti tisraḥ sa vāvṛdhe divyam suparṇam
yasya vratam paśavaḥ yanti sarve yasya vratam upatiṣṭhante āpaḥ
yasya vrate puṣṭi patiḥ niviṣṭaḥ tam sarasvantam avase huvema
yai mā viśvā bhuvanāni iti vaiśvakarmaṇasya caturthīm parihāpya
tisraḥ tisraḥ pūrvāḥ puronuvākyā vapāyāḥ puroḷāśasya paśoḥ tisraḥ tisraḥ uttarāḥ yājyāḥ
sāvitra vāc devatyā ai ca aupāṃśu
parivyayaṇīya ādi vapā antam prātaḥsavane paśu karma kṛtvā niṣkramya tathā eva aupaspṛśya cātvale cātvāle
agreṇa havirdhāne tiṣṭhantaḥ tam tam īkṣamāṇāḥ
saṃrāj asi kṛśānoḥ raudreṇa anīkena pāhimā agne pipṛhimā namaste astu mām āhiṃsīḥ iti āhavanīyam
api jaḥ asi duvasvān iti mathitvā anuprahṛtam
dakṣiṇaḥ āvṛtaḥ vibhūḥ asi pravāhaṇā eti āgnīdhram
prapatsyamānāḥsadaḥ ca opari abhimṛśanti diva spṛṣṭham asimām āsaṃtāpsīḥ iti
ṛtasya dvārau om āsaṃta aptam iti dvāryau sammṛśya
uttareṇa āgnīdhrīyam dhiṣṇyam gacchanti ye pratyañcaḥ dhiṣṇyān atikrāmanti
malim lucaḥ asi sagaraḥ iti āsādam acchāvākasya
uśi gasi kavi rasi iti potuḥ
ṛta dhāmā asi svar jyotiḥ iti audumbarīyam
samudraḥ asi viśva vyacāḥ iti sadaḥ anuvīkṣya
agnayaḥ sagarāḥ sagarāḥ stha sagareṇa nāmnā raudreṇa anīkena pātama agnayaḥ pipṛtama namaḥ vaḥ astu mām ā hiṃsiṣṭa iti sarvān
adhvanaḥ adhipatiḥ asi svastinaḥ adya asmān deva yāne pathistā āditya ādityam upasthāya maitrāvaruṇa prabhṛtayaḥ audañcaḥ acchāvākam parihāpya pūrvayā dvārā āsadaḥ prasarpanti
viśvedevāḥ anumā prasarpata aindra tridhātu śaraṇa myata aindra bhayā mahesadasaspatim adbhutam iti japantaḥ agreṇa auttareṇa sarvān dhiṣṇyān gacchanti
dakṣiṇa dhiṣṇyaḥ dakṣiṇa dhiṣṇyaḥ pūrvaḥ gatvā svasya svasya dhiṣṇyasya paścāt upaviśati
uttareṇa sadaḥ gatvā brahmā aparayā dvārā sadaḥ prapadya dakṣiṇena maitrāvaruṇam gatvā yathāāsanam āste
antareṇa hotuḥ maitrāvaruṇasya ca dhiṣṇyau adhiṣṇyānām
hotā ayakṣat indram aharivān iti anusavanam praiṣaḥ yathā samāmnātam
tena eva yajati uddhṛtya hotā ayakṣam hotaryajam ca
agne juṣaḥ svanaḥ haviḥ iti sviṣṭakṛtaḥ puronuvākyā
hotā ayakṣat agni puroḷāśānām iti anusavanampraiṣaiḥ
haviḥ agne vīhi iti ca yājyā
aindra vāyava maitrāvaruṇau āśvinaḥ ca dvi devatyāḥ
vāyavāya ahi darśata aindra vāyu ima iti aindra vāyavasya puronuvākye
hotā ayakṣat vāyum hotā ayakṣat indra vāyū iti praiṣau
ayam vām mitrāvaruṇā iti maitrāvaruṇasya puronuvākyā
an avānam dvidevatyānām puronuvākyāḥ praiṣān ca āha
sakṛt purastāt japaḥ yeyajāmahaḥ anumantraṇaḥ ca
etu vasuḥ purūvasuḥ iti aindra vāyavam pratigṛhya auraudakṣiṇe nidhāya an apidhānam an avekṣaṇam ca dvidevatyānām ā aśeṣasya avanayanāt
etu vasuḥ vidat vasuḥ iti maitrāvaruṇam pratigṛhya dakṣiṇena aindra vāyavam hṛtvā dakṣiṇatas paścāt nidadhāti
aituvasuḥsamyadvasuḥiti āśvinam pratigṛhya dakṣiṇena pūrvau hṛtvā uttaratas paścāt nidadhāti
somasya agne vīhi iti anuvaṣaṭkāraḥ sarvāsu soma yājyāsu dvi devatya ṛtuyājān parhāpya ādityagraha sāvitragraha aupātnīvatam ca
unnīyamānebhyaḥ eti ukta ā tvā avahantu harayā iti unnīyamāna sūktam
hotā ayakṣat indram prātar prātar sāvasya eti praiṣaḥ
idam te somyam madhu iti yajati
nṛcakṣasam tvā anṛcakṣāḥ pratīkṣa etihotṛ camasam pratīkṣya vayodhasam tvā avayodhāḥ pratigṛhṇāmi iti pratigṛhya uraḥ saṃsparśayati dvidevatyān ca
ayāṭ agnīdh iti ukte ayāṭ iti āgnīdhraḥ
sa bhadram akaryā unaḥsomam pāyayiṣyati itihotā
somam bhakṣayiṣyantaḥ yājñikaiḥ nāmadheyaiḥ asau upahvayasva etikartāraḥ anyaḥ anyasmin upahavam icchante
pratibhakṣitam dvi devatya śeṣam nārāśaṃsavatām ca grahāṇām hotṛ camase avanayati hute tvā abhakṣitam avanayāmi ūrjasvantam devebhyaḥ āyuṣmantam mahyam iti
dvis aindra vāyava śeṣasya avanayanam tatra abhyāvartate mantraḥ
an avasarjanam ca dvidevatyānām ā aśeṣasya avanayanāt

ihavasuḥ purūvasuḥ iti aindra vāyavam adhvaryave pragṛhya upahūtau vāyuḥ indra vāyū saha prāṇena saha varcasā tayoḥ aham upahūtaḥ saha prāṇena saha varcasā iti bhakṣayitvā pragrahaṇa mantreṇa punar pragṛhyabhakṣa mantreṇa punar bhakṣayati
upahūtau mitrāvaruṇau saha cakṣuṣā saha varcasā tayoḥ aham upahūtaḥ saha cakṣuṣā saha varcasā iti bhakṣayitvā
āśvinam pradakṣiṇam śiraḥ paryāhṛtya avekṣya pratiparyāhṛtya avekṣya
upahūtau devau aśvinau saha śrotreṇa saha varcasā tayoḥ aham upahūtaḥ saha śrotreṇa saha varcasā iti bhakṣayitvā
a saṃsparśanam sarvatra ājya lepena somasya
tejase tvā brahmavarcasāya bhakṣayāmi iti bhakṣa mantraḥ prātaḥsavane
ojasā tvā indriyāya bhakṣayāmi iti mādhyaṃdine
prajāyai tvā a puṣṭyai bhakṣayāmi iti tṛtīyasavane
śamnaḥ bhava hṛdā iti uraḥ abhimarśanī bhakṣayitvā
savye pāṇau camasān kṛtvā dakṣiṇena āpyāyayanti
āpyāyasva sametu tu iti āpyāyanī prātaḥsavane
ājya praugayoḥ nārāśaṃsa aniṣkevalya marutvatīyayoḥ vaiśvadeve ca
devaḥ asi narāśaṃsaḥ yat te medhaḥ svar jyotiḥ tasya tau umaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ bhakṣitasya upahūtasya upahūtaḥ bhakṣayāmi iti bhakṣa mantraḥ prātaḥsavane nārāśaṃsānām
acchāvākaḥ sīda iti uktaḥ agreṇa sadā auttareṇa srutim upaviśya puroḷāśam pratigṛhya acchāvāka vadasva iti uktaḥ acchāvaḥ agnim avasā eti tisraḥ anvāha
yajamāna hotar adhvaryo agnīdh brahman potar neṣṭa ruta aupavaktṛ riṣeṣayadhvam ūrjā ūrjayadhvam
jeṣatha abhītvaryāḥ śravatvaindraḥ śṛṇavatvai vaḥ agniḥ prasthāya aindra agnibhyām somam vocata upa u asmān brāhmaṇān brāhmaṇa āhvayadhvam iti
upahavam ayam brāhmaṇaḥ ecchate acchāvākaḥ vā iti adhvaryuḥ āhatam hotar upahvayasva eti
prati etāvān asunvan yajamānaḥ agrabhīt uta pratiṣṭhā ūtiḥ
uta no gāvau aupahūtā iti atas an upahvāsyamānaḥ
an upahūtaḥ acchāvākaḥ nivartadhvam iti sūktasya yāvat śaknuyāt tāvat anudravet
hotā ava a pratikāminam acchāvākam pratyupahūya
unnīyamānāya iti uktaḥ prati asmai pipīṣate iti acchāvākaḥ sūtram anvāha
bhakṣitā āpyāyitam camasam adhvaryave pradāya dakṣiṇaḥ āvṛt aparayā dvārā āsadaḥ prapadya svasya dhiṣṇyasya paścāt upaviśya puroḷāśam prāśnāti
pūrvaḥ prasṛptaḥ ced acchāvākīyām kuryāt svena visaṃsthita saṃcareṇa niṣkramya acchāvākasya bahiṣkarma kṛtvā sva karma kurute
prātaḥsavane anvā anantaḥ yajanti ardharcaśaḥ vā
hotā ayakṣat indra mahotrā āditi ṛtupraiṣaiḥ an avānam preṣyati
yena preṣyati sā yājyā uddhṛtya hotā ayakṣam asauyajam ca
maidhātithyā uvā aindra somam piba ṛtunā iti
yaḥ yaḥ praiṣa ante śrūyate sa sa yajati
hotar etat yaja eti adhvaryuḥ āha
limpet iva eva jighret atra dvi devatyeṣu ca eti

ājyam śaṃsiṣyan pitā mātariśvā acchidrāpada auśigasīya anutakṣiṣat somaḥ nīthavit nīthā nineṣat bṛhaspatiḥ ukthāmadāniśaṃsiṣat iti japitvā ā śoṃsāvaḥ iti āhāvaḥ śastra ādau prātaḥsavana itena āhūya upāṃśu tūṣṇīmśaṃsam
agniḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ agniḥ iti avasāya aindraḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ indra iti avasāya sūryaḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ sūrya iti avasāya pacchas avasyan purorucam
saḥ adhvara ākarati jātavedaḥ pravaḥ devāya eti ājyam
sūkta śeṣam śastvā āhūya uttamayā paridhāya ukthavīryam japati bhāvi bhā uṣāḥ svar jyotiḥ ślokāya tvā uktham avāci iti
uktha śāiti adhvaryuḥ āha sarvāsu śastra yājyāsu
stotravatām śastrāṇām eṣā iti prāha auttamāt pratīhārāt ūrdhvam āhūya śaṃsanti
prauge antareṇa mādhucchandasān tṛcān ṛcaḥ vyavayanti tāḥ purorucaḥ iti ācakṣate
tasyām dvābhyām dvābhyām avasāya dvābhyām praṇauti
vāyuḥ agregāḥ yajñaprīḥ sākamgan manasā yajñam
iti sakṛt śastvā vāyavāya ahi darśata eti tisṛṇām tris prathamām
vāyuḥ ca aindraḥ ca su makhau
kāvyayoḥ rājā aneṣu kratvā dakṣasya duroṇe
daivyau adhvaryū āgatam rathena sūrya tvacā
indra aukthebhiḥ bhiandiṣṭhaḥ vājānām ca vāja patiḥ
viśvān devān havāmahe asmin yajñe sajoṣasaḥ
taiḥ mama yajñam āgaman devāsaḥ devyodhiyā
ye yajñasya tanū kṛtaḥ viśve ā soma pītaye
vācām aham devīm vācam asmin yajñe supeśasam
pāva kānaḥsarasvatī iti tisṛṇām uttamayā paridhāya ukthavīryam japati vācam me jinva
ānom itāvaruṇa ānogantam iti stotriya anurūpau maitrāvaruṇasya
pramitrayoḥ iti navānām uttamayā paridhāya aupanaḥ sutam āgatam iti yajati
āyāhi suṣuma iti brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ stotriya anurūpau
udgha id abhi iti tisṛṇām uttamayā paridhāya aindra kratu vidam iti yajati
indra agnī āgatam sutam iti acchāvāka sya stotriya anurūpau
iha aindra agnī upahvayā eti pañca
iyam vām asya manmanā eti navānām uttamayā paridhāya aindra agnī āgatam sutam iti yajati
mitram vayam indram id gāthinā aindra agna aiti stotriyā bṛhat pṛṣṭhasya
stotriya anurūpābhyām yat ca anantaram anurūpāt paridhānīyāyai ca
anurūpāt anantaraḥ pragāthaḥ tasmāt ūrdhvam pañcamam madhyaṃdine
dakṣiṇaḥ āvṛtaḥ aparayā dvārā nihsarpanti uttareṇa audumbarīm dakṣiṇena brahmā
mādhyaṃdināya savanāya yathānihsṛptam prasṛpya yathāāsanam upaviśanti

grāvastut pūrvayā dvārā havirdhāne prapadya auttarasya havirdhānasya dakṣiṇam cakram agreṇa dakṣiṇā tiṣṭhan soma aupanahanena mukham pariveṣṭya agrau aghoṣam śrutvā a sampreṣitaḥ abhiṣṭauti a saṃtanvan ardharcaśaḥ an avānam vā
abhitvā deva savitar yuñjate manau tayuñjate dhiyaḥ ātūn aindra kṣumanta mānobhara dakṣiṇena upakramasva ābhara
āpyāyasva sametu te iti āpyāyitavatīnām tisṛṇām prathamām abhiṣṭutya arbudasya dve
mṛjanti tvāt daśa kṣipaḥ etam utyam daśa kṣipaḥ etam mṛjanti marjyam iti mṛṣṭavatīḥ abhiṣṭutya
ā kalaśāḥ anūṣata ā kalaśa iṣudhāvati pari pra somati rasa eti kalaśavatīḥ abhiṣṭutya
āpyāyitavatī prabhṛti evam vihṛtaḥ dvitīyaḥ apisavaḥ
yasmin save bṛhat śabdam kuryuḥ bṛhat vadanti iti tatra
vitate pavitre pavitram te eti dve viyat pavitram iti ekā
pra asya dhārāḥ pradhārā asya pratedhārā iti prakṣaranti iṣu dhārāsu
uttame grahe gṛhīte arbudasya auttamayā paridhāya ādāya oṣṇīṣam utsṛjyate
mādhyaṃdine stute pavamānena dadhigharmeṇa caranti yadi pravargyavān
hotar vadasva eti uktau uttiṣṭhata avapaśyata iti prathamām abhiṣṭauti
śrātam haviḥ iti uktā idvitīyām sūktasya
dadhigharmasya yaja iti uktaḥ tṛtīyayā āyajati
an avānam ekaikām sa praṇavām abhiṣṭauti
dadhi gharmasya agne vīhi iti anuvaṣaṭkāraḥ
mayi tyad indriyam bṛhat mayi dakṣaḥ mayi kratuḥ
gharmaḥ triśuc virocate ākūtyā manasā saha
virājā a jyotiṣā saha tasya doham aśīmahi
paśupuroḷāśena caritvā atas puroḷāśaiḥ savanīyaiḥ caranti
hotā ayakṣat indram mādhyaṃdinasya savanasya eti praiṣaḥ
pibāḥ somam abhiyam ugra eti yajati
indra aya somāḥ pradivaḥ vidānāḥ iti acchāvākasya
na dvi devatya ṛtuyājāḥ uttarayoḥ savanayoḥ
agnaye tvā mahyam varuṇaḥ dadātu saḥ amṛta tvam aśīya
āyuḥ dātre edhi mayaḥ mahyam patigṛhṇata eti hiraṇyam pratigṛhṇāti
rudrāya tvā mahyam varuṇa dadātu saḥ amṛta tvam aśīya
gauḥ dātre edhi mayaḥ mahyam pati gṛhṇatitigāḥ
bṛhaspataye tvā mahyam varuṇaḥ dadātu saḥ amṛta tvam aśīya
tvac dātra edhi mayaḥ mahyam pratigṛhṇata eti vāsaḥ
yamāya tvā mahyam varuṇa dadātu saḥ amṛta tvam aśīya
hayaḥ dātra edhim ayaḥ mahyam pratigṛhṇata eti ekaśapham
prajāpataye tvā mahyam varuṇa dadātu saḥ amṛta tvam aśīya
prāṇaḥ udātra edhi mayaḥ mahyam pratigṛhṇata iti anyat
kaḥ adāt kasmā adāt iti anumantrayate prāṇi
asmad rātāḥ madhumatīḥ devatrā agacchata pradātāram āviśata eti dattvā japati
hotā ayakṣat indram marutvantam iti praiṣaḥ
adhvaryo śoṃ śāvaḥ iti āhāvaḥ śastra ādau mādhyaṃdine savane
ā tvā aratham yathā ūtaye eti prātipadam tṛcam śastvā āhūya
idma vasosutam andhaḥ eti anucaram tṛcam śastvā āhūya
indra nedīya edihi iti indra nihavam pragātham śastvā āhūya
pra nūnam brahmaṇaspatiḥ iti brāhmaṇaspatyam pragātham śastvā āhūya
agniḥ netā iti ekām śastvā āhūya
tvam soma kratubhiḥ iti ekām śastvā āhūya
janiṣṭhāḥ ugrā iti ṣaṣ śastvā āhūya nividam
ekayā a bhūyasīḥ śastvā a viṣamaṛcānām
sūkta śeṣam śastvā āhūya uttamayā paridhāya ukthavīryam japitvā yetvā ahi hatyā eti yajati
abhitvāśūra abhitvāpūrva pītayeti stotriya anurūpa aupragātha aurathantarasya
tvām id hi havāmahe tvamhi ehi cerava eti bṛhataḥ
uktha vīryam japitvā pibā somam indram andatu tvā iti yajati
rathantara pṛṣṭha iyaḥsūktāt pūrvaḥ pragātaḥ tam uddhṛtya bṛhataḥ yonim śaṃsati
bṛhat rathantarayoḥ eva anuśaṃset iti hasmakauṣītakiḥ
parimita śasyaḥ prākṛtaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ tasmāt pragātham uddharati
stotriyāya āhāvaḥ anurūpāya dhāyyāyai pragāthāya sūktāya nivide paridhānīyāyai ca
kayānaḥ citraḥ kayātu amnaūtyā iti stotriya anurūpau
tam vaḥ dasmam tat tvā ayāmi su vīryam iti stotriya anurūpau pragāthau naudhasasya
abhi pravaḥ pra su śruta mitiśyaitasya
tarobhiḥ vastaraṇiḥ id siṣāsati iti stotriya anurūpau pragāthau
bṛhatī pūrvā kakubh vāsatobṛhatī uttarātam pragātaḥ iti ācakṣate
bṛhatīm śastvā uttamam pādam pratyādāya uttarasyāḥ prathamena avasāya dvitīyena praṇutya tam pratyādāya tṛtīyena avasāya uttamena praṇauti
tāḥ tisraḥ bhavanti bṛhatī pūrvā uttare kakubhau
hotrakāṇām ca yatra ete pṛṣṭhe pragātha sthe
bṛhatīm śastvā uttamam pādam dvis pratyādāya avasāya ardharcena uttarasyāḥ praṇutya dvitīyam pādam dvis pratyādāya avasāya uttamena ardharcena praṇauti
dvābhyām avasāya dvābhyām avasāya ekena praṇauti paṅktīnām
ap chas triṣṭubh jagatīnām akṣarapaṅktīnām dvipadānām ca
sa praṇavaḥ dvitīyaḥ ca caturthaḥ ca
yāḥ tu pañca padāḥ traiṣṭubhe prāye jāgate vā yatra punar padam syāt tau tatra samasyet na padena punar padasya viprayogaḥ asti
dvābhyām avasāya dvābhyām avasāya dvābhyām praṇauti ṣaṣ padānām punaḥpadānām
dvābhyām avasāya apunar padānām ekena praṇauti dvābhyām avasāya ekena
ekena avasāya sapta padānām dvābhyām praṇauti dvābhyām avasāya dvābhyām
prathameṣu rātriparyāyeṣu gāyatrāṇām stotriya anurūpāṇām prathamān pādān abhyasyanti
sahi śardha ūna mārutam iti aṣṭau
ekena dvābhyām iti ūna keni cṛt
sampādya pāda bhāgena āhāryasya ṛcaḥ sammitāḥ tasya pāda bhāgena sampannāḥ
gāyatrī uṣṇihau anuṣṭubh bṛhatyau paṅktiḥ ca triṣṭubh jagatyau iti ānupūrvyam chandasām caturviṃśati akṣara ādīnām catur uttarāṇām catur uttarāṇām
yathā madhyaṃdināya evam ūrdhvam madhyaṃdināt prasarpanti
ārbhavena stute pavamānena manotā diḍā antam pauḥkarma kṛtvā atas puroḷāśaiḥ savanīyaiḥ caranti
hotā ayakṣat indram tṛtīyasya savanasya eti praiṣaḥ

iḍām upahūya prasthitān bhakṣayitvā puroḷāśasya parivāpa miśrasya nārāśaṃsānām sannānām yathācamasam dakṣiṇatas trīn trīn piṇḍān upāsyanti atra pitaraḥ mādayadhvam yathābhāgam pitaraḥ āvṛṣāyadhvam iti pṇḍe piṇḍe
hotā ayakṣat devam savitāram iti praiṣaḥ
damūnāḥ devaḥ savitā avareṇyaḥ dadhat ratnam dakṣa pitṛbhyaḥ āyuni
pibāt somam amadannenam iṣṭayaḥ parijmā cit ramate asya dharmaṇi iti yajati
adhvaryo śośoṃ sāvaḥ iti āhāvaḥ śastra ādau tṛtīyasavane saukthe
tat savituḥ vṛṇīmahe adya anaḥ devasavitaḥ iti tṛcau pratipad anucarau vaiśvadevasya
ekayā ca daśabhiḥ ca sva bhūte dvābhyām iṣṭaye viṃśatī ca
tisṛbhiḥ ca vaha se triṃśatā aca niyudbhiḥ vāya viha tā muñcaḥ
pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī ṛtāvṛdhaḥ eti dyāvāpṛthivīyam
ayam venaḥ yebhyaḥ mātā eva pitrā eti ekapātinyaḥ
ānaḥ bhadrāḥ iti vaiśvadevasya auttameśiṣ tvā nividam
ukthavīryam japitvā viśve devāḥ śṛṇuta emam iti yajati
ghṛtasya yaja iti uktaḥ ghṛtam mimikṣe iti upāṃśu yajati
saumyasya yaja eti uktaḥ tvam soma pitṛbhiḥ iti yajati
uru viṣṇo vikramasva auru kṣaya ayanaskṛdhi
ghṛta ghṛta yone piba pra pra yajña patim tira
saumyam hotā avekṣya aṅgulibhyām sarpiḥ upaspṛśati
cakṣuṣpāḥ asi cakṣuḥ me pāhi iti cakṣuṣī vimārṣṭi
agnīdh pātnīvatasya yaja iti uktaḥ ā ebhiḥ agne sa ratham iti upāṃśu yajati
a bhakṣayitvā graham ādāya pūrvayā dvāra āsadaḥ prapadya
yajñāyajñāvaḥ agnaye devaḥ vaḥ draviṇaḥ dāḥ iti stotriya anurūpau pragāthau yajñāyajñīyasya
imamyam amātalī kavyaiḥ aṅgirobhiḥ iti yāmyaḥ
yayoḥ ojasā viṣṇoḥ nukam tantum tanvan iti eka pātinyaḥ
eva an aindraḥ maghavā iti paridhāya ukthavīryam japitvā agne marudbhiḥ śubhayadbhiḥ iti yajati
yāvanti sūkta ani tāvat yoni vidaḥ
apsu somān sādayitvā anuyāja ādi śamyu antam paśu karma kṛtvā hāriyojanena caranti
apṣu dhūta sya deva soma te mati vido nṛbhi
ṣṭuta stotrasya śasta ukthasya eṣṭayajuṣaḥ yaḥ aśva saniḥ go saniḥ bhakṣaḥ tasya taupahūtasya upahūtaḥ bhakṣayāmi iti prāṇabhakṣān bhakṣayitvā ādhānau yādadhate
yathā ahatya dvasava eti dhiṣṇyān samīkṣya āgnīdhrīyam uttareṇa āhavanīyam āyanti
bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar svāhā satu amnaḥ agne avamaḥ tu amnaḥ agne varuṇasya tat astu mitrāvaruṇā iti āgnīdhrīye prāyaścitta āhutīḥ juhvati
ā purastām ā prajayā paśubhiḥ pūrayata iti āhavanīyasya bhasma antedhānāni upya pañca pañca śakalān ādadhate

ātma kṛtasya enasaḥ avayajanam asi manuṣya kṛtasya enasaḥ avayajanam asi pitṛ kṛtasya enasaḥ avayajanam asi deva kṛtasya enasaḥ avayajanam asi yat ca aham enaḥ vidvān cakāra yat ca avidvān tasya sarvasya avayajanam asi iti
savya āvṛtau uttareṇa āhavanīyam apsu somān yathācamasam paścāt upopaviśya pavitrāṇi avadhāya ceṣṭayante
sam ā apaḥ adbhiḥ agmata sam ā oṣadhayoḥ rasena
samrevatīḥ jagatībhiḥ pṛcyantām sma madhumatīḥ madhumatībhiḥ pṛcyantām iti
apsudhūtasya deva soma te mati vidaḥ yaḥ aśva saniḥ go saniḥ bhakṣaḥ tasya taupahūtasya upahūtaḥ bhakṣayāmi iti prāṇabhakṣān bhakṣayitvā
acchā ayam vo yayoḥ ojasā iti prācīḥ ninīya audīcīḥ vā
samānam prāṇa sammarśanam mukha vimārjanam ca
patnī samyājān saṃsthāpya huta iṣu samiṣṭa yaju hṣu avabhṛtam avaiti
punar mām aitu indriyam punar ātmā draviṇam brāhmaṇam ca
punar agnayaḥ dhiṣṇyāsaḥ yathāsthānam dhārayantām iha eva
iti yajamānaḥ dhiṣṇyān samīkṣya atra anūbandhyāyām vā a saṃsthitāyām ṛtvijaḥ samīkṣeta
namaḥ varuṇāya ahi iṣṭhitaḥ varuṇasya pāśaḥ iti apsu pādam avadhāya
apṣu agne apṣume soma iti vā apsumantau
satvamnaḥ agne avamaḥ tvamnaḥ agne varuṇasya vidvān iti agnīvaruṇau ādiśati
ājyabhāgau vā a parihāpya anuyājau ca
yena striyau akurutam yena apāmṛśatam surām yena akṣām abhyaṣiñcatam yena emām pṛthivīm mahīm yat vām tat aśvinā ayaśaḥ tena mām abhiṣiñcatam
iha u sahasra dakṣiṇaḥ api pūṣā niṣīdatu
iti upaviśya āhavanīye samidhau ādadhāti devānām samidh asi iti pūrvām tūṣṇīm uttarām
āvām mitrāvaruṇā tatsuvām mitrāvaruṇā omitrāvaruṇā iti puronuvākyāḥ
yuvam vastrāṇi yat banhiṣṭham prabāhava iti yājyāḥ
dīkṣaṇīyā prabhṛti ā anubandhyāyāḥ saṃsthānāt navede patnīm vācayati naḥ tṛṇāti
anubandhyāyām vācayitvā agreṇa āgnīdhrīyam dhiṣṇyam stṛṇāti
mā āpaḥ mā oṣadhīḥ hiṃsīḥ śuc asi yam dviṣmaḥ tam te śuc ṛcchatu
yadā apaḥ aghnyāḥ iti varuṇa iti śapāmahe tatas varuṇa naḥ muñca
iti hṛdayaśūlam upasthāya su mitriyāḥ naḥ āpaḥ oṣadhayaḥ santu iti upaspṛśya durmitriyāḥ tasmai santu yaḥ asmān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ iti dakṣiṇā nirukṣanti
udan udavasāya vaiṣṇavyā ṛcā pūrṇaāhutim hutvā udavasānīyayā āyajati
yāḥ punarādheya ita ā haviṣaḥ sviṣṭkṛtaḥ ca
yasmai preṣyati ātasya apavargāt vācam yacchati
yaḥ te drapsaḥ skandati drapsaḥ caskanda eti vipruṣām homaḥ purastāt pavamānānām
agnicityāyām ca agnau praṇīyamāne apratiratham japati
viśvā āśā dakṣiṇatas sarvān devān ayāṭ iha
apātām aśvinā gharmam an udyāvāpṛthivī amaṃsātām
iha eva rātayaḥ santu iti anuvaṣaṭkṛte
indraḥ marutvān iha śravat iha somasya pibatu
pra emām devaḥ deva hūtim avatu devyā dhiyā
rūpam anurūpam pratirūpam surūpam iha aupa uyaḥ bhadram āśṛṇvate tvā uktham avāci indrāya eti
indraḥ deva aihaśravat iha somam pibatu
saṃrāj asi svarāj asi virāj asi rājā asi abhibhūḥ asi abhibhūya asma vayamyam dviṣmaḥ apaśṛṇvate tvā uktham avāci indrāya eti
savitā devaḥ parā amīvām sāviṣat parā agha śaṃsam
iha śravat iha soma sya matsat
dyāvāpṛthivī iha śrutām iha somasya matsatām
pra imām devī deva hūtim avatām devyā dhiyā
ye dhenum viśva juvam viśva rūpām atakṣan
ṛbhavaḥ devāḥ iha śravan iha soma syamatsan
pra imām devāḥ deva hūtim avantu devyā dhiyā
ye dyām ca pṛthivīm ca atasthuḥ
mā avaḥ devaḥ aviśasa amāviśasa āyuḥ āvṛkṣi
viśvedevāḥ iha śravan iha soma syamatsan
bhūtam asi bhaviṣyat asi vibhūtam asi prabhūtam asi sat asi cakṣuḥ asi ojaḥ asi bhadram asi śrutāya etvā avāci indrāya uktham devebhyaḥ
agniḥ vaiśvānaraiḥ ha śravat iha soma syamatsad
marutaḥ devāḥ iha śravan iha soma sya matsan
pratītya a śatrūn jetā a parājitaḥ
agniḥ jātavedāḥ iha śravat iha soma sya matsat
tejaḥ asi dhṛṣṭiḥ asi vidhṛṣṭiḥ asi pradhṛṣṭiḥ asi vidhṛtiḥ asi dharuṇam asi dhartram asi dharyaḥ asya āśrutyai tvā avāci indrāya uktham devebhyaḥ
asya made jaritar indraḥ ahi mahan
asya made jaritar indraḥ vṛtra mahan
asyamadejaritar indra uddyām astabhnāt aprathayat pṛthivīm
asya made jaritar indraḥ vi antarikṣam atiradā sūryam divyairayat
asya made jaritar indraḥ apinvat apitaḥ ajinvat ajuvaḥ
asya made jaritar indra ṛṣyān iva pamphaṇataḥ parvatān prakupitān aramṇāt
asya made jaritar indraḥ apām vegam airayat
asya made jaritar indra eha śravad upa giriṣṭhāt
asyamadejaritar indra aiha śravadiha soma syamatsad
rohobhyām rohaḥ bradhnasya viṣṭapam svargyā tanūḥ nākaḥ eti nākaḥ iti
vyākhyātaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ prakṛtiḥ dvādaśa ahasya eka ahānām ca
śrūyamāṇam prākṛtam nāmadheyam anyasmin dravye prakṛtim nivartayati
āgnimārutāt ūrdhvam āgamāt trayāṇām śastrāṇām ukthyaḥ bhavati
antareṇa āgnimārutam anuyājān ca eteṣām sthānam
carṣaṇī dhṛtam astabhnāt dyām iti tṛcau
vayam u tvā amapūrvyayonai dam idam iti stotriya anurūpa aupragāthau
pra manhiṣṭhā yayaḥ adri bhid iti tṛcau
astāivasu prataram iti uttamām uddhṛtya audaprutaitiśastvāya āpūrvasya auddhṛtātayā paridhāya bṛhaspateyuvam indraḥ ca iti yajati
adha ahi indra eti stotriya anurūpau
indrāviṣṇū mada patī madānām iti yajati
yasmāt jātaḥ na paraḥ anyaḥ asti yaḥ ābabhūva bhuvanāni viśvā
prajāpatiḥ prajayā saṃrarāṇaḥ trīṇi jyotīṃṣi sacate sa ṣoḷaśī
indra juṣa sva pra vaha āya ahi śūra hari ha
piba asutasya matiḥ namadhvaḥ cakānaḥ cāruḥ madāya
indra jaṭha ramna vyamna pṛṇa sva madhoḥ divaḥ ūna
asya sutasya svarṇau patvā madāḥ suvācaḥ asthuḥ
indraḥ turāṣāh mitraḥ na jaghāna vṛtramyatiḥ na
bibheda valam bhṛguḥ na sasāhe śatrūn made somasya
ā tvā avahantu harayaḥ svādoḥ itthā iti gāyatram tṛcam pāṅktam ca viharati
prathamena gāyatreṇa pādena prathamam pāṅktām pādam saṃdhāya avasyati
indra āyasām agāyatā mandraiḥ indra haribhiḥ iti auṣṇiham tṛcam bārhatam ca viharati
prathamena auṣṇihena pādena prathamam bārhatam pādam saṃdhāya avasyati
aṣṭa akṣaram auṣṇihasya pādasya aṣṭa akṣaram bārhatasya tābhyām avasyati
catur akṣare śiṣṭa ite samasya auttamam bārhatam pādam saṃdhāya praṇauti
ādhūrṣu urumnā eti dvi padām caviṃśati akṣarām triṣṭubham ca viharati
prathamena dvaipadena pañca akṣareṇa prathamam traiṣṭubham pādam saṃdhāya avasyati
dvitīyena pañca akṣareṇa dvitīyam saṃdhāya praṇauti
tṛtīyena pañca akṣareṇa tṛtīyam saṃdhāya avasyati
caturthena pañca akṣareṇa caturtham saṃdhāya praṇauti
eṣa brahmāya ṛtviya aindraḥ nāma śrutaḥ gṛṇe
tvām id śavasaspate iyanti giraḥ naḥ samyataḥ
prate mahaiti dvaipadam tṛcam jāgatam ca viharati
prathamena dvaipadena catur akṣareṇa prathamam jāgatam pādam saṃdhāya avasyati
dvitīyena catur akṣareṇa dvitīyam saṃdhāya praṇauti
tṛtīyena catur akṣareṇa tṛtīyam saṃdhāya avasyati
caturthena catur akṣareṇa caturtham saṃdhāya praṇauti
indra udadhīcaiti tisṛṇām gāyatrīṇām dvābhyām avasāya pādābhyām dvābhyām praṇauti dvābhyām avasāya dvābhyām
uttamena gāyatreṇa pādena proṣu asmai puroratham iti etasyāḥ pādam saṃdhāya avasyati
stotriye ca āhāvaḥ nivide paridhānīyāyai ca
yat yat bradhnasya eti paridhāya ukthavīryam japitvā apāḥ pūrveṣām iti yajati
etasmin stotriye catvāriṃśat sampadaḥ ā anuṣṭubhaḥ
indraḥ ca saṃrāj varuṇaḥ ca rājātau te bhakṣam cakratuḥ agre etam
tayoḥ aham bhakṣam anubhakṣayāmi vāgdevī juṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu
pa anta mā vaḥ andhasa eti stotriya anurūpau hotuḥ prathameṣu rātri paryāyeṣu
pra vā aindrāyamādanam prakṛtāni iti maitrāvaruṇasya
su rūpa kṛtnum iti uktha mukham
tyam su meṣam iti jāgatasya navamīm ca auttamām ca auddhṛtya caturdaśīm pūrvām śastvā trayodaśyā a paridhāya pātā sutām indraḥ astu somam hantā vṛtram iti yajati
vayam utvā tad idarthā vayam utvā divāsuta itibrāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ
vārtrahatyā yaśavasā iti vā uttamām uddhṛtya
indra ayam advanesutam indram id gāthinaḥ bṛhat iti acchāvākasya
ayam te aindra somaḥ ayam te mānuṣejana iti stotriya anurūpau hotuḥ madhyameṣu rātriparyāyeṣu
udghet abhi iti uktha mukham uttamām uddhṛtya
ātūn aindra kṣumantam ātūn aindra vṛtrahan iti maitrāvaruṇasya
asya made puru varpāṃsi iti yajati
ā tūna aindram adrī ak iti uktha mukham
ajāta śatrum iti jāgatasya auttamām uddhṛtya audyat saha iti paridhāya edam te pātram sana vittam indra iti yajati
idam hi anvojasā mahān indraḥ yaḥ ojasā iti stotriya anurūpau hotuḥ uttameṣu rātriparyāyeṣu
śeṣaḥsūktasya auktha mukham uttamāḥ tisraḥ uddhṛtya
ātu etān niṣīdata ātu aśatrava āgahi iti maitrāvaruṇasya
yasya saṃsthā aiti sapta auktha mukham
yoge yoge yuñjanti bradhnam iti brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ
imām te dhiyam iti jāgatasya auttamām uddhṛtya tat asya edam paśyata iti paridhāya pra udroṇa iti yajati
indraḥ suteṣu someṣu indram vardhantu iti acchāvākasya
upa naḥ sutam āgahi somam indra eti uktha mukham
panyam panyam it sotāraḥ panyaiḥ dupagāya taiti stotriya anurūpau prathame
ā tvā āviśantu indavaḥ ā tvā āviśantu āśavaḥ iti uttame
saṃsthāpya rātri paryāyān āśvina ayaḥ toṣyamāṇa iṣu pravṛta āhutī juhoti
bārhatīnām pratipadām prathamam prathamam pragātham punar ādāyam kakupkāram
agniḥ hotā gṛhapatiḥ iti pratipadā aporevatīm uddhṛtya
prathamam tukākṣīvatam śastvā akārādhat hotriyān ava
ayam vām madhumattamaḥ eti aṣṭau yathāsthānam
