yadi ca enam yajamānena pṛṣṭhe abhimarśayeyuḥ aham ca tvam ca iti japet
saṃsthite madhyame ahani āhavanīyam abhitas dikṣu prāsādān viminvanti
tān upariṣṭāt sa nivyādhaiḥ prākāraiḥ parighnanti
atra ātreyam sahasreṇa avakrīyayaḥ śukraḥ piṅga akṣaḥ valinaḥ tilaka avalaḥ khaṇḍaḥ baṇḍaḥ ṣaṇḍaḥ
atha enam udake abhipragāhya yadā asya audakam mukham āsyandeta atha asmai adhvaryuḥ mūrdhani aśvatedanim juhoti bhrūṇahatyāyai svāhā iti
yat ekavidham tat eka rātreṇa āpnoti
dve vā ahar rātre dve dyāvāpṛthivī dve ime pratiṣṭhe
tat yat kimca dvividham adhidaivatam adhyātmam tat sarvam enena āpnoti
na a saṃvatsara dīkṣitāya mahāvratam śaṃset
mukhyaḥ uvā eṣa yajña kratuḥ yat agniṣṭomaḥ
tatam me yajñena vardhate iti ārbhava jātavedasīye dvitiyasya
abhijit viśvajitau caturviṃśa mahāvrate go āyuṣī vā
trayaḥ vai ime lokāḥ trīṇi jyotīṃṣi triṣavaṇaḥ yajñaḥ
tat yat kiṃca trividham adhidaivatam adhyātmam tat sarvam enena āpnoti
trivṛt prabhṛtayaḥ trayaḥ stomāḥ prathamasya ahnaḥ
madhyamāt chandomāt traiṣṭubhaḥ praugaḥ dvitīyasya ahnaḥ
yat dvitīyasya ahnaḥ marutvatīyam tat tṛtīye ahani karoti
tat imān lokān sambhoginaḥ karoti tasmāt hi ime lokāḥ anye anyam abihbhuñjanti iti
kaḥ tam indra eti sāmapragāthaḥ niṣkevalyasya
mā ūṣu tvā vāghataḥ cana eti stotriya anurūpau pragāthau maitrāvaruṇasya auddhṛtya dvipadām
astau imat mā ubhayam śṛṇavat iti brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ
śrāyanta eva sūryam śagdhi ūṣu śacīpate iti acchāvākasya
yad indra prāc apāk udak iti kadvān
kayāśubhīya tadidāsīya iva anivid dhāne dvitīyasya
etam eva garga trirātra iti ācakṣate
āhi ekā jagatī tā idve gāyatryau
ayam lokaḥ gāyatraḥ tat asmin loke pratitiṣṭhati pratiṣṭhāyām apracyutyām
amākāryā iti āhuḥ yajamānasya eva sambhūtyai iti
yā āyantīnām prathamau uparamet sā āsyāt iti āhuḥ
yā saṃtiṣṭhantīnām prathamā upaviśet sā āsyāt iti āhuḥ
yā asat tam āsā asyāt iti āhuḥ
sarva veda trirātre tri śukriyaḥ brahmāyasya aubhayatas śrotriyāḥ tri puruṣam
tat yat kim ca caturvidham adhidaivatam adhyātmam tat sarvam enena āpnoti
trivṛt prathamam ahar pañcadaśam dvitīyam saptadaśam tṛtīyam ekaviṃśam caturtham
te vai ete catvāraḥ stomāḥ nānā vīryāḥ yajñakratavaḥ tena ha asya catvāraḥ vīrāḥ nānā vīryāḥ prajāyām ājāyante yaḥ evam veda
trivṛt prathamasya ahnaḥ prātaḥsavanam pañcadaśaḥ mādhyaṃdinaḥ saptadaśam tṛtīyasavanam
pañcadaśam dvitīyasya ahnaḥ prātaḥsavanam saptadaśaḥ mādhyaṃdina ekaviṃśam tṛtīyasavanam
saptadaśam ttīyasya ahnaḥ prātaḥsavanam ekaviṃśaḥ mādhyaṃdinaḥ triṇavam tritīyasavanam
ekaviṃśam caturthasya ahnaḥ prātaḥsavanam triṇavaḥ mādhyaṃdinaḥ trayastriṃśam tṛtīyasavanam
te iva eka ekam stomam utsṛjantaḥ yanti eka ekam prajanayantaḥ
tena ha asya catvāraḥ vīrāḥ nānā vīryāḥ prayājām ājāyante
pañca padā paṅktiḥ pāṅktaḥ vaiyajñaḥ tat yat kim ca pañcavidham adhidaivatam adhyātmam tat sarvam enena āpnoti
trivṛt prathamam ahar pañcadaśam dvitīyam ekaviṃśam tṛtīyam saptadaśam caturtham catuṣṭomaḥ atirātraḥ auttamam ahar
tat vai idam āsām eva rūpeṇa
tat yat ekaviṃśa stomānām varṣiṣṭhaḥ tasmāt iyam āsām varṣiṣṭhā
atha yat catuṣṭomaḥ atirātraḥ auttamam ahar tasmāt ayam aṅguṣṭhaḥ sarvāḥ aṅgulīḥ pratyeti
pañcamasya ca dve savane ṣaṣṭhāt pṛṣṭhyasya pañcame tṛtīyasavanam
ubhayoḥ vā abhijit caturthaḥ viśvajit pañcamaḥ
yat pañcavidham tat pañcarātreṇa āpa iti
atha yat ṣaḍvidham tat ṣaṣ rātreṇa
ṣaṭ vā ṛtavaḥ ṣaṭ stomāḥ tat yat kim ca ṣaḍvidham adhidaivatam adhyātmam tat sarvam enena āpnoti
tri ahaḥ abhijit viśvajitau vaiśvānaraḥ ca mahāvratam vā
yat ṣaḍvidham tat ṣaṣ rātreṇa āpnoti
sapta prāṇāḥ sapta chandāṃsi tat yat kim ca sapta avdham adhidaivatam dhyātmam tat sarvam enena āpnoti
tri ahaḥ abhijit viśvajitau mahāvratam vaiśvānaraḥ ca
prākṛtaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ caturviṃśam abhijit viṣuvān viśvajit mahāvratam vaiśvānaraḥ ca
atha yat aṣṭavidham tat aṣṭa rātreṇa
aṣṭau vasavaḥ aṣṭa akṣarā gāyatrī tat yat kim ca aṣṭavidham adhidaivatma adhyātmam tat sarvam enena āpnoti
ubhayoḥ vā abhijit saptamaḥ viśvajit aṣṭamaḥ
yat aṣṭavidham tat aṣṭa rātreṇa āpnoti
catasraḥ diśaḥ catasraḥ avāntara diśaḥ ūrdhvāḥ iyam navamī dit nava akṣarā bṛhatī tat yat kim ca navavidham adhidaivatam adhyātmam tat sarvam anena āpnoti
ṣaṣ ahaḥ abhijit viśvajitau vaiśvānaraḥ ca mahāvratam vā anantaram vā abhijitaḥ mahāvratam viśvajit navamaḥ
jyotiḥ agniṣṭomaḥ gauḥ ukthyaḥ āyuḥ atirātraḥ tris etam upayanti śalalīpi śaṅgā iti ācakṣate
daśa akṣarau ilāḥ annam virāj tat yat kim ca daśavidham adhidaivatam adhyātmam tat sarvam enena āpnoti
etena ha jalaḥ jātūkarṇyaiḥ ṭvā trayāṇām nigusthānām purodhām prāpa kāśya vaidehayoḥ kausalyasya ca
tasya hatat śvetaketuḥ śriyam abhidhyāya pitaram adhyūhe palita yajña kāmān yān vā uśriyā yaśasā samardhayitum vā itthanaḥ ātmānam iti
mā mā evam putra vocaḥ yajña kratuḥ evam e vijñātaḥ abhūt tam eva etat kṛtsnake brahmabandhau vyajijñāsiṣi
tat u kila tathā eva āsa yathā eva enam provāca
pra purodhām āpnoti yaḥ evam veda
agniṣṭut indrastut vaiśvadevastut pṛṣṭhyaḥ vaiśvānaraḥ ca
ṣaṣ ahaḥ abhijit aśvajitau mahāvratam vaiśvānaraḥ ca
prākṛtaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ navamaḥ aṣṭamaḥ vā viśvajit daśamaḥ
atha yat ekādaśavidham tat ekādaśa rātreṇa
ekādaśa akṣarā triṣṭubh traiṣṭubhāḥ paśavaḥ tat yat kim ca ekādaśavidham adhidaivatam adhyātmam tat sarvam enena āpnoti
te ete purastāt agniṣṭomāḥ upariṣṭāt atirātrāḥ uttara auttariṇaḥ eka uttarāḥ ahīnāḥ
uttara auttariṇīm eva tat śriyam virājam anna adyam āpnoti yaḥ evam veda yaḥ evam veda
purastāt eva katipaya ahena hotā āpreṅkha phalakam utpāṭayati
yadi purastāt na vidyeta atha api uttaratas
mūle chedayitvā prān vā udan vā tiṣṭhan utpāṭya yadi aṇuḥ udumbaraḥ syāt
api devā trīṇi vā phalakāni saṃtṛḍyuḥ
atha etasya vā eva audumbarasya anyasya vā viśākhyau chedayanti
yadi udumbaraḥ na vidyeta yaḥ anyaḥ vṛkṣaḥ phala grahiṣṇuḥ kalyāṇa abhivyāhāraḥ vā asyāt tasya etat upakalpayet
tām saṃhatya mauñjībhiḥ syāndyābhiḥ vivayanti dviguṇābhiḥ prasala visṛṣṭābhiḥ
atha etām vīṇām śata tantrīm upakalpayanti
api vā audumbarī sūnā pālāśaḥ daṇḍaḥ
tām ānaḍuhena sarva rohitena carmaṇā bāhyatas lomnā abhiṣīvyanti
vetasa śākhā sa palāśā vādinī upaklṛptā bhavati
ghāṭa karkarī rava ghaṭarikāḥ kāṇḍavīṇāḥ piccorāḥ iti patnyaḥ upakalpayanti
yā āghāṭarīm ṛdum vādayet sā arātiḥ syāt
pūrvasyai dvāryāḥ abhitas dvāra bāhu bahis sadaḥ saṃdhau sahananau āsañjayati
aparasyai dvāryāḥ abhitas dvāra bāhū antar sadaḥ saṃdhau sahananau āsañjayati
yadi ṣaṭ syuḥ dakṣiṇa ardhe sadasaḥ ekam uttara ardha ekam
muñjānām ca kuśānām ca kūrcam adhvaryave saṃskurvanti
atha etare dīkṣitāḥ pratipuruṣam bṛsīḥkurvate yathā prādeśa mātreṇa aupari bhūmeḥ syuḥ
atha yā mārjālīyam paryeṣyantyaḥ bhavanti tābhyaḥ pratyekam navān kalaśān upakalpayanti
atha etam aśva ratham upakalpayanti vitata varūtham
yadi rājā avā rājamātraḥ vā avidyeta yaḥ etām dhiyam vidyāt sa etat kuryāt
uttareṇa āgnīdhram prāñcyau prahve sthūṇe viminvanti ākhaṇāya
tat iḍa saṃvartam vā utkaram vā carmaṇā abhivitanvanti
tam etasya aupālambhyasya ṛṣabhasya carmaṇā prācīna grīveṇa audīcīna grīveṇa vā uttaratas lomnā abhiṣīvyanti
tam tasya eva lāṅgūlena kāle bhūmidundubhim āghnanti
atha śūdra āryau strī pumāṃsau baṇḍa khalatī iti upakalpayanti
tat etat purāṇam utsannam na kāryam etasmin samupaklṛpte
saṃsthite daśame ahani sadaḥ havirdhānāni samūhanti
katipayān kuśa bhārān nidadhati prātar bṛsībhyaḥ
atha ete pariṣṭavaṇīyāḥ bhavanti tṛvṛt pañcadaśaḥ saptadaśaḥ ekaviṃśaḥ iti
aindrāgna uvā aikādaśinānām vā ekaḥ savanīyaḥ
aindraḥ ca ṛṣabhaḥ prājāpatyaḥ ca aja aupālambhyau

te yatra vapāsu hutāṣu samprasarpanti tat etat preṅkha miśram bahirvedi prakṣālya antareṇa cātvāla autkarau tīrtham tena prapadya uttareṇa āgnīdhrīyam dhiṣṇyamparyāhṛtya pūrvayā dvāra āsadaḥ prahṛtya agreṇa auttareṇa hotuḥ dhiṣṇyam prān upanidadhati
evam eva yasya yasya bahirvedi bhavati yathā saṃcaraḥ samprasarpaṇe bhavati tathā āhṛtya auttaratā upanidadhati
tasya traiṣṭubham prātaḥsavanam syāt itipaiṅgyam śuṣkabhṛṅgārīyam
viśaḥ viśaḥ vaḥ atithim iti ājyam
tasya dvādaśa ardharcaśaḥ śastvā agnim naraḥ dīdhitibhiḥ araṇyoḥ iti etat pañcaviṃśati ṛcam upasaṃśaṃsati
kuvid aṅga namasāya vṛdhā asaiti vāyavyam ca aindravāyavam
kathām ahām avṛdhat kasyahotuḥ iti aindram
uta sya anaḥ sarasvatī juṣāṇā eti sārasvatam
ā tvā rathamyathā ūtaye ti marutvatīyasya pratipad
asat sumejaritaḥ sa abhivegaḥ iti vāsukram pūrvam śastvā mahān indraḥ nṛvat ācarṣaṇi prāḥ iti etasmin traiṣṭubhe nividam dadhāti
saṃsthite prātaḥsavane preṅkha vaṭau kha ānayet iti sa āsthitiḥ

jaghanena svam dhiṣṇyam padam ca catur aṅgulam ca pramāya tat paścāt udīcīna agram phalakam nidhāya ubhayatas catur aṅgule upadhāya bahis catur aṅgulābhyām lekhe lekhayitvā preṅkha avaṭau khānayet dakṣiṇam pūrvam atha auttaram
prāñcau auvā udañcau auvā utkira utkiranti
tat viśākhyau avadhāya audīcīna agram vaṃśam abhyādadhāti
yadi hrasvaḥ syāt ūrdhva bāhuḥ mimīte
dṛḍha paryuṣṭe paryṛṣati yathā an avyatheyātām
atha etat preṅkha phalakam rajjubhiḥ caturdhā anteṣu parivyayati yathā na sambhraśyeta
uttareṇa dakṣiṇām preṅkha sthūṇām dakṣiṇām rajjum badhnanti
dakṣiṇena auttarām preṅkha sthūṇām uttarām rajjum badhnanti
tat sambādhya prāsyati yathā prādeśa mātreṇa aupari bhūmeḥ syāt
tat abhinivīḍham paryṛṣati yathā an avyatheta
tat sambādhya auttarasyām preṅkha sthūṇāyām apāśrayati
atha adhvaryuḥ māhendram graham gṛhītvā iti
tam hotā āha adhvaryo upanurama eti

sa auttareṇa auttarām preṅkha sthūṇām uttareṇa adhvaryum pranau upaniṣkramya pūrvayā dvārā āgnīdhram prapadya auttareṇa āgnīdhrīyam dhiṣṇyam paryetya paścāt prān upaviśya dakṣiṇam jānu ācya sruveṇa ājya sthālyā upahatya juhoti
āyuṣmat gāyatram viśvāyu rathantaram sarva āyuḥ bṛhatsāma āyuḥ vāmadevyam atyāyuḥ yajñāyajñīyam teṣām aham āyuṣā ayuṣmān bhūyāsam asyai prāṇaḥ saṃcarati prajāyai hṛdayāyakam
dive svāhā antarikṣāya svāhā pṛthivyai svāhā iti tisraḥ
gave svāhā vāce svāhā vācaspataye svāhā iti aparāḥ tisraḥ
yat idam itihā aitiham daivyam saha uccaret
tat vayam yajāmahe yat asmabhyam iti dravat
vācaḥ rājan yajā mahe vācaspate saha svame
svāhā iti aṣṭamīm hutvā yathāāyatanam sruvam nidhāya yathāprapannam upaniṣkramya agreṇa sadā auttareṇa srutim pra antiṣṭhan parimādān japān japati
vāc āyuḥ viśva āyuḥ viśvam āyuḥ ehi eva ahi indra upehi viśvatha vidā maghavan vidā iti
atha atra eva tiṣṭhan agnim yathāaṅgam upatiṣṭhate
namaḥ te gāyatrāya yat te śiraḥ yat te purā eti pūrva ardham
namaḥ te rathantarāya yaḥ te dakṣiṇaḥ bāhuḥ yaḥ te dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ eti dakṣiṇam pakṣam
namaḥ te bṛhate yaḥ tauttaraḥ bāhuḥ yaḥ tauttaraḥ pakṣaḥ iti uttaram pakṣam
namaḥ te vāmadevya ayatte madhyam yasta ātmā iti madhyam
namaḥ te yajñāyajñīyāya yat te puccham yā pratiṣṭhā iti puccham
samiddhasya eva etān bhāgān upatiṣṭheta yadi uttaravedau bhavati
atha atra eva tiṣṭhan ādityam upatiṣṭhate
ākāśam śālāyai kuryuḥ iti ha eke āhuḥ
subhūḥ nāma asi śreṣṭhaḥ rāśmiḥ devānām saṃsadyayā tanvā brahmajinvasitayām ājinvatayāmā janayatayāmā apāhi brahmavarcasam anna adyam mayi tviṣim dhānam aste astu mām āhiṃsīḥ iti
paścāt preṅkhamprān upaviśya tat anvārabhya an anusṛjan vāgyata āsta ā adhisarpaṇāt
sa purastāt deva chandogebhyaḥ śīrṣaṇyān tṛcān nigādayeta
sa purastāt eva adhvaryuṇā a saṃvādayeta
dvādaśa kṛtvas tūṣṇīm śaṃse pratyāgṛṇītāt vihṛtam ātmānam ca pada anuṣaṅgān ca saṃśiṣya abhyavahṛtam tvam pratyāgṛṇītāt iti
atha prastotāram āha saptasu stotriyāsu pariśiṣṭāsu naḥ prabrūta tāvat hi idam japyam iti
yatra eva audgātā āsandīm adih rohati atha prastotā pratihartārau bṛsyau adhisarpataḥ
atha pūrṇa kumbhāḥ apaḥ bibhratyaḥ omārjālīyam pariyanti
prasa lavi tu uṣṇīm tatas ūrdhvam
tam samnaddhaḥ ātiṣṭhati rājāvā rājamātrā uvādhanuḥ ca trīn ca eṣūn ādāya
saḥ abhitas vedim tris prasala viparivartamānaḥ etam ākhaṇam vidhyati
atha prastotā sapta su stotriyā su pariśiṣṭā svāhā velā iti
atha hotā a dakṣiṇena prādeśena preṅkha phalakam ca bhūmim ca samṛśan japati sam mahān mahati ādadhāt iti
atha aupari preṅkha phalake prādeśam nidhāya japati sam devaḥ devyā ādadhāt iti
atha aupari preṅkha phalakāt prādeśa mātre prādeśam dhārayan japati sam brahma brāhmaṇyā dadhāt iti
atha a upanidhāya preṅkha phalakam tris abhyanya tris abhyavāniti
atha enat urasā saṃspṛśya dakṣiṇam bhāgam ātmanaḥ atiharan japati arkaḥ asi vasavaḥ tvā gāyatreṇa chandasā ārohantu tān aham anvārohāmi rājyāya eti
atha auttaram bhāgam ātmanaḥ atiharan japati rudrāḥ tvā atraiṣṭubhena chandasā ārohantu tān aham anvārohāmi svārājyāya eti
atha dakṣiṇam bhāgam ātmanaḥ atiharan japati ādityāḥ tvā jāgatena chandasā ārohantu tān aham anvārohāmi sāṃrājyāya eti
atha auttaram bhāgam ātmanaḥ atiharan japati viśve tvā devāḥ ānuṣṭubhena chandasā ārohantu tān aham anvārohāmi kāmaprāya eti
atha samadhiṛpya prāñcau aupādāḥ upāvahṛtya bhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayati
atha aupari preṅkha phalake dakṣiṇa auttariṇam upastham kṛtvā dakṣiṇena prādeśena paścāt preṅkha phalakam upaspṛśati prajāpatiḥ tvā ārohatu vāyuḥ preṅkhayatu iti

sam vāc prāṇena sam aham prāṇena sam cakṣuḥ manasā sam aham manasā sam prajāpatiḥ paśubhiḥ sam aham paśubhiḥ suparṣaḥ asi garutmān pra imām vācam vadiṣyāmi bahu kariṣyantīm bahu kariṣyan bāhoḥ bhūyas svar gamiṣyantīm svar gamiṣyan iti
sa visṛṣṭavān matsaram vininīṣamāṇaḥ āsta āstotrasya pravadanāt
yatra eva hotā apreṅkham adhirohati tat sarve sa gṛhapatikāḥ bṛsīḥ adhisarpanti
atha pūrṇa kumbhāḥ apaḥ bibhratyaḥ omārjālīyam pariyanti
mārjālīya itas kalaśān avaninīya upanidhāya yathā etam utsṛjyante
uccais āhūya tris upāṃśu himkṛtya aupāṃśu tūṣṇīmśaṃsam
brahma jajñānam prathamam purastāt iyam pitre rāṣṭryāḥ iti agre viśve deva āmam aśṛṇvantu yajñiyāḥ iti etāḥ tisraḥ ṛcaḥ tūṣṇīm śaṃsaḥ tāḥ upāṃśu apraṇuvan pacchas
tat idāsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭham iti stotriyaḥ tṛcaḥ
vanena vā yoni adhāyi ca akan iti aṣṭau
yaḥ adadhāt jyotiṣi jyotiḥ antar mahat tat nāma guhyam puruspṛh idam te ekam paras te ekam iti tisraḥ eka pātinyaḥ
triḥśas tayā a prathamayā saha pañcaviṃśatiḥ
prathamena traiṣṭubhena padena prathamam nadasya padam upasaṃdhāya avasyati
evam a vihṛtām prathamām tris śaṃsati
evam vihṛtā evayā tṛtīyāsu uktasya tasyāḥ uttaram ardharcam utsṛjati nadasya ca auttaram
tā asya sūdadohasā eti tām ardharcaśaḥ
indram id gāthinā aindreṇa samhi indra udadhīcaḥ uttiṣṭhan ojasā saha udghā id abhiśrutāmagham udutyam jātavedasam iti eteṣām tṛcān āmi eṣu sāmagāḥ stuvīran tāni śaṃset
ud utyam jātavedasam iti etasmin uha ekena varceḥ stuvate
te yadi tathā kuryuḥ etat eva śaṃset
ud utyam jātavedasam iti etasya uha eke prathame tṛce stuvate
te yadi tathā kuryuḥ itareṣām ye kāmayeta te upāharet
yasya edam ojaḥ ārujaḥ tujaḥ yujaḥ balam sahaḥ
sanaḥ da dātu tam rayim puru piśaṅga saṃdṛśam
urumnaḥ loka manu neṣi vidvān iti akṣā
tām pad śas śastvā atha sūdadohasam
atha rathantarasya stotriyam punar ādāyam kakupkāram atha sūdadohasam
atha rathantarasya anurūpam punar ādāyam kakupkāram atha sūdadohasam
atas dhāyyām pacchas śastvā atha sūdadohasam
atha rāthantaram pragātham ardharcaśaḥ śastvā atha sūdadohasam
yaḥ eka ed havyaḥ carṣaṇīnām iti sūktam tat pacchastasya dvitīyām uddhṛtya viśvaḥ hi anyaḥ arirājagāma eti yā etasya dvitīyā tām iha dvitīyām karoti sūktam śastvā atha sūdadohasam
tam indram johavīmi maghavānam ugram iti prahastakaḥ tṛcaḥ
tam pad śas śastvā atha sūdadohasam
sa sūrye janayan jyotiḥ indra ū ayā adhiyā taraṇiḥ aṅgirasvān
ṛtena śuṣmī havamānaḥ arkaiḥ abhispṛdhau sraḥ vedim tatardaiti akṣā
tām pad śas śastvā atha sūdadohasam
atha bṛhataḥ stotriyam punar ādāyam kakupkāram atha sūdadohasam
atha bṛhataḥ anurūpam punar ādāyam kakupkāram atha sūdadohasam
atha bārhatam pragāta hma ardharcaśaḥ śastvā atha sūdadohasam
viśvaḥ hi anyaḥ arirājagāma iti sūktam tat pacchastasya dvitīyām uddhṛtya yaḥ ekaḥ ed havyaḥ carṣaṇīnām iti yā etasya dvitīyā tām iha dvitīyām karoti
viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ abhibhūta ramnaram iti prahastakaḥ tṛcaḥ
tasya pacchas prathamām śaṃsati ardharca śā uttare
atha etāni catur uttarāṇi tṛcāni śaṃsati
indrāya madvanesutam indram vṛtrāya hantave gāyantitvā gāyatriṇaḥ na tvā bṛhantaḥ adraye iti catvāri tṛcāni
itthā ahi soma id mada iti pāṅktam tṛcam tat paṅkti śaṃsam
sam ca tve jagmuḥ girā aindra pūrvī rāt aṅgirāḥ prathamam dadhi reva yaiti traiṣṭubha jāgate tṛce
mahān indraḥ yaḥ ojasā iti etayā gāyatrīm aśītim pratipadyate
indra id soma pā ekaiti aṣṭau
eva edeṣatu vik ūrmiḥ iti trīṇi
ā tvā āviśantu indavā aiti catvāri
yad ad ya kacca vtra han iti pañca
idam hi anvojasā uttiṣṭhan ojasā saha abhipragopatim iti trīṇi tṛcāni
teṣām yat purastāt kṛtam syāt tat uddharet
yadi uvā ena kuryuḥ udeva haret
yaḥ ānayat parāvatā eti daśa tṛcāni
yāḥ indra bhujaḥ ābhara iti etayā bārhatīm aśītim pratipadyate
tam gha im itthā namasvinā eti dve
na sīma deva āpa diti ṣaṣ
mā ūṣu tvā vāghataḥ cana eti catvāraḥ auddhṛtya dvipadām
tattvāyāmi su vīryam yukṣva ahi vṛtra hantama eti dvau dvau
yat indra prāc apāk udak iti sapta
yaḥ śakro mṛkṣaḥ aśvyā iti ṣaṣ
tām pacchas śastvā āhūya nividam dadhāti
uttamena padena praṇutya sajātebhiḥ iti nividā āśaṃsati
tām pad śas śastvā atha sūdadohasam
ye ṣaṇṇām trayaḥ pariśiṣṭāḥ taiḥ pratipadyate
teṣām dvau pragāthau utsṛjati indra nihavam ca vaiśvadevam ca ānaḥ viśve sajoṣasā eti

matsyapāyite mahaḥ asmā asmā id andhasaḥ balam dhehi tanū su naḥ yujānaḥ haritā rathe tavaid indra aham āśasā amā su pakva maiḥ ayai yamyā anīcī arkiṇī prateratham mithūkṛtam antar yaccha jighāṃsataḥ tvam viśvasya jagataḥ eti daśa ekapātinyaḥ
ayam te astu haryata ā mandraiḥ indra haribhiḥ iti sūkte
indraḥ suteṣu someṣu iti etayā auṣṇihīm aśītim pratipadyate
yā aindra soma pātam aiti ekādaśa teṣām ekam utsṛjati indram vṛtrāya han tava eti
yaḥ ekaiḥ dvidayata āyāhi adribhiḥsutam iti dve tṛce
nakir indra tvat uttarā eti ṣaṣ
divaḥ cit ghā duhitaram iti caturdaśa
ā tūna aindra vṛtra han iti ekaviṃśatiḥ
āvā aindram krivim yathāyat indra aham yathā tvam iti pañcadaśa ṛce
pra saṃrājam carṣaṇīnām uttvā amandantu stomāḥ iti dvādaśa ṛce
vayam u tvā amapūrvyāḥ iti aṣṭaukākubhāḥpragāthāḥ
atha ekaviṃśī dvāviṃśī caturviṃśī ca paṅktayaḥ tāḥ paṅkti śaṃsam
śatam dāse balbūthā iti pañca padātasyai trīṇi padāni samasya avasyet dvābhyām praṇuyāt
trayodaśī ca triṃśattamī ca dvipada ete pad śas śastvā atha sūdadohasam
atha etau vihṛtau ardharcau atha sūdadohasam
pra vā indrāya vṛtra hantamāya vipra a gātham gāyata yat jujoṣati
arcanti arkam marutaḥsu arka āstobhati śrutaḥ yuvā sā aindraḥ
upa pra kṣe madhum ati kṣiyantaḥ puṣye marayim dhīmaheta aindra
viśvatas dāvan viśvatas naḥ ābharayan tvā aśaviṣṭham īmahe
sa supraṇīti inṛ tamaḥ svarāj asi maṃhiṣṭhaḥ vājasātaye
tvam hi rādhasya taḥ eka īśiṣe sanā dam ṛktaḥ ojasā iti ṣaṣ
ādhūrṣva smai vajram ekaḥ ayāvājam deva hitam sanema eti
tāḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ dvi padāḥ tāḥ pacchas
atha etat aindrāgnam sūktam gāyatrī śaṃsam śaṃsati indra agnīyuvam sunā eti
tasya dvitīyā sapta padā tasyāḥ anuṣṭubham pūrvām karoti śaṃsam gāyatrīm uttarām
tubhyai idam indra pariṣicyate madhu iti ekā
svādoḥ itthā viṣūvataḥ eti pāṅktam tṛcam tat paṅkti śaṃsam
pra vaḥ mahe mahi vṛdhe bharadhvam iti vairājam tṛcam tad ardharcaśaḥ
prati asmaipipīṣata iti ānuṣṭubham tṛcam tad ardharcaśaḥ
yaḥ te sādhiṣṭhaḥ avasā eti sapta
ā indrayā ahi haribhiḥ iti pañcadaśa
ā tvā giraḥ rathīḥ iva eti sarvam
āyāhi arvān upavandhureṣṭhāḥ udhmasyate vṛṣabhasya sva rājā eti sūkte
nṛṇām utvā anṛtamam gīrbhiḥ ukthaiḥ iti tṛcam
āsatyaḥ yātu maghavān ṛjīṣī iti sarvam
tatra purastāt udbrahmīyasya pada anuṣaṅgān śaṃsati yaḥ vyatīn raphāṇayat iti etasmin tṛce prathamāyāḥ ardharcam uktvā uparamati
atha prathamāyai tṛtīyena padena dvitīyāyai prathamam padam upasaṃdhāya praṇauti
atha prathamāyai uttamena padena dvitīyāyai dvitīyam padam upasaṃdhāya avasyati
atha dvitīyāyai tṛtīyena padena uttamāyai pathamam padam upasaṃdhāya praṇauti
atha dvitīyāyai uttamena padena uttamāyai dvitīyam padam upasaṃdhāya avasyati
atha u udbrahmīyasya auttamām pariśiṣya āhvayate
paridhāya aukthavīryam japati aikāhikam pūrvam māhāvratikam uttaram mahat asi yaśaḥ asi bhargaḥ asi bhogaḥ asi bhuñjat asi mama bhogāya bhava iti
tat etat sakṛt śastāyām sūdadohasi yāvat śastram upasarjanyām saṃkhyāyamānāyām ṛte tūṣṇīm śaṃsam bṛhatī sahasram sampadyate
sa graham eva āyantam pra anupāvarohati
parāmṛśan graham japati yat imam prajayam prājaiṣam tam anvasāni iti
adhvaryuḥ aupahavam iṣṭvā bhakṣayati ojasetvā iti
tasya bhakṣa upamā yantu mat jayaḥ sa nīlā upamā jakṣuḥ upamā manīṣā priyā maham tanvam paśyamānaḥ mayi ramaḥ devānām ojase tvā iti
atha camasān bhakṣayanti devaḥ asi narāśaṃsa eti
tat savituḥ vṛṇīmahe adya anaḥ devasavitaḥ iti tṛcau pratipad anucarau vaiśvadevasya
tat devasya savituḥ vāryam mahat iti sāvitram
tehi dyāvāpṛthivī viśva śambhuvā iti dyāvāpṛthivīyam
kimu śreṣṭhaḥ kim yaviṣṭhaḥ ūnaḥ ājagan iti ārbhavam
asya vāmasya palitasya hotuḥ iti salilam vaiśvadevam tasyāḥ samudrāḥ adhivikṣaranti samānam etat udakam iti ete ardharcaśaḥ aṃsatipad śaitarāḥ
te yadi yajñāyajñīyam agniṣṭoma sāma kuryuḥ tasya uktau stotriya anurūpau
agne tavaśravaḥ vayaḥ iti stotriyaḥ tṛcaḥ atas eva auttaraḥ sūkta anurūpaḥ
yadi u sarvasmin ṣaṣ arceḥ stuvīran a agnimna svavṛktibhiḥ iti etasya ṣaṣ anurūpam kurvīta
yadi yuvā aticchandaḥsu kuryuḥ agnim hotāram manyet āsu antam iti stotriya stṛcaḥ atas eva auttaraḥ sūkta anurūpaḥ
yā saptamī sūktasya tām tṛtīyām karoti saḥ anurūpaḥ
ayam jāyata manuṣodharī maṇi iti vā stotriyaḥ tṛcaḥ ataeva uttaraḥ sūkta anurūpaḥ
tatra sarvān kara snān sambādhya preṣyati maitrāvaruṇaḥ
te prathamam āsam dīkṣita vasanān iva avasate
atha etarān māsān ajinān iva ā ārdra vasanān iva āvasate
te yadi yajña agāraiḥ bhokṣyamāṇāḥ bhavanti ādadhataḥ eva preṅkha miśram
tasya eva pāyām saṃsthitāyām dakṣiṇa ardha apara ardhāt vedeḥ kiṃcid pariśritya tasmin upaviśya keśa śmaśrūṇi vāpayanti
tasyām saṃsthitāyām yathāsamprakīrṇam agnīn samāropya antareṇa cātvāla utkarau upaniṣkrāmanti
uttaratas udghāta avokṣite agni āyatanāni kṛtvā gomayena upalipya mathitvā agnīn vihṛtya praṇītāḥ praṇīya pūrṇa āhutīḥ hutvā pṛthak udavasānīyābhiḥ yajante ye āhita agnayaḥ bhavanti
atha ye anāhita agnayaḥ gṛhapatim evatau upāsate
yadi tu yajeta ete eva asya satriṇaḥ ṛtvijaḥ syuḥ
tebhyaḥ tat dadyāt yat deyam syāt
